trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to ignore the IN_LIST operator. The NEW behavior is to interpret the IN_LIST operator.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是忽略IN_LIST运算符。在 NEW 行为解释IN_LIST操作。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to ignore the link options.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是忽略链接选项。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to ignore the visibility properties for static libraries, object libraries, and executables without exports. The NEW behavior for this policy is to honor the visibility properties for all target types.
trans-unit.target: 该策略的 OLD 行为是忽略静态库，对象库和可执行文件的可见性属性，而无需导出。此策略的 NEW 行为是保留所有目标类型的可见性属性。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to implicitly dereference variables named like numbers and boolean constants. The NEW behavior for this policy is to recognize numbers and boolean constants without dereferencing variables with such names.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是隐式取消引用名为数字和布尔常量的变量。此策略的 NEW 行为是识别数字和布尔常量，而不用这种名称反引用变量。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to issue no warning and set the result variable to a -NOTFOUND value. The NEW behavior for this policy is to issue a FATAL_ERROR if the command is called with a non-existent target.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是不发出警告，并将结果变量设置为 -NOTFOUND 值。如果使用不存在的目标调用该命令，则此策略的 NEW 行为是发出 FATAL_ERROR 。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to leave VERSION variables untouched. The NEW behavior for this policy is to set VERSION as documented by the project() command.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是保持 VERSION 变量不变。此策略的 NEW 行为是设置 project() 命令记录的 VERSION 。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to never pass -module option. The NEW behavior is to pass -module option to SWIG compiler if SWIG_MODULE_NAME is specified.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是永不通过 -module 选项。在 NEW 行为是通过 -module 选项 SWIG 如果编译器 SWIG_MODULE_NAME 指定。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to not honor BEFORE keyword in private scope. The NEW behavior of this policy is to honor BEFORE keyword in all scopes.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是不接受私有范围内的 BEFORE 关键字。此策略的 NEW 行为是在所有范围内都使用 BEFORE 关键字。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to not initialize CMAKE_CUDA_ARCHITECTURES when CMAKE_CUDA_COMPILER_ID is NVIDIA. Empty CUDA_ARCHITECTURES is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 当 CMAKE_CUDA_COMPILER_ID 为 NVIDIA 时，此策略的 OLD 行为是不初始化 CMAKE_CUDA_ARCHITECTURES 。允许为空的 CUDA_ARCHITECTURES 。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to not manage PIE link flags. The NEW behavior is to add link flags if POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE is set:
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是不管理 PIE 链接标志。在 NEW 行为是添加链接标志，如果 POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE 是集：

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to not propagate interface link properties. The NEW behavior of this policy is to propagate interface link properties.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是不传播​​接口链接属性。此策略的 NEW 行为是传播接口链接属性。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to not set the value of the CMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS variable in the generated test project. The NEW behavior for this policy is to set the value of the CMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS variable in the test project to the same as it is in the calling project.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是不要在生成的测试项目中设置 CMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS 变量的值。此策略的 NEW 行为是将测试项目中的 CMAKE_EXE_LINKER_FLAGS 变量的值设置为与调用项目中的值相同。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to omit TARGET_OBJECTS expressions from the SOURCES target property. The NEW behavior for this policy is to include TARGET_OBJECTS expressions in the output.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是从 SOURCES 目标属性中忽略 TARGET_OBJECTS 表达式。此策略的 NEW 行为是在输出中包含 TARGET_OBJECTS 表达式。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to perform a case-insensitive comparison with the value in the <LANG>_COMPILER_ID expression. The NEW behavior for this policy is to perform a case-sensitive comparison with the value in the <LANG>_COMPILER_ID expression.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是与 <LANG>_COMPILER_ID 表达式中的值执行不区分大小写的比较。此策略的 NEW 行为是与 <LANG>_COMPILER_ID 表达式中的值进行区分大小写的比较。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to place MSVC runtime library flags in the default CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG> cache entries and ignore the CMAKE_MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY abstraction. The NEW behavior for this policy is to not place MSVC runtime library flags in the default cache entries and use the abstraction instead.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是将MSVC运行时库标志放在默认的 CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_<CONFIG> 缓存条目中，并忽略 CMAKE_MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY 抽象。此策略的 NEW 行为是不要将MSVC运行时库标志放在默认的缓存条目中，而应使用抽象。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to place MSVC warning flags in the default CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS cache entries. The NEW behavior for this policy is to not place MSVC warning flags in the default cache entries.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是将MSVC警告标志放在默认的 CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS 缓存条目中。此策略的 NEW 行为是不在默认缓存条目中放置MSVC警告标志。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to place definition values given to add_definitions directly in the generated build rules without attempting to escape anything. The NEW behavior for this policy is to generate correct escapes for all native build tools automatically. See documentation of the COMPILE_DEFINITIONS target property for limitations of the escaping implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是将赋予add_definitions的定义值直接放置在生成的生成规则中，而不会尝试转义任何内容。此策略的 NEW 行为是自动为所有本机生成工具生成正确的转义。有关转义实现的限制，请参见 COMPILE_DEFINITIONS 目标属性的文档。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to proceed even when a normal variable of the same name exists. If the cache entry does not already exist and have a type then it is created and/or given a type and the normal variable is removed.
trans-unit.target: 即使存在同名普通变量，此策略的 OLD 行为仍会继续。如果缓存条目尚不存在且具有类型，则创建和/或给定类型，然后删除普通变量。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to provide the list of flags given so far to the add_definitions() command. The NEW behavior is to behave as a normal user-defined directory property.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是提供到目前为止给 add_definitions() 命令提供的标志列表。在 NEW 行为是表现为正常的用户定义的目录属性。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to re-evaluate the values for strict compatibility. The NEW behavior for this policy is to leave the values untouched.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是重新评估值以实现严格的兼容性。此策略的 NEW 行为是保持值不变。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to run the install rules from add_subdirectory() after the other install rules. The NEW behavior for this policy is to run all install rules in the order they are declared.
trans-unit.target: 该策略的 OLD 行为是在其他安装规则之后从 add_subdirectory() 运行安装规则。此策略的 NEW 行为是按照声明的顺序运行所有安装规则。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to search for targets, then files on disk, even if the search term contains double-colons. The NEW behavior for this policy is to issue a FATAL_ERROR if a link dependency contains double-colons but is not an IMPORTED target or an ALIAS target.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是搜索目标，然后搜索磁盘上的文件，即使搜索词包含双冒号也是如此。如果链接依赖项包含双冒号但不是 IMPORTED 目标或 ALIAS 目标，则此策略的 NEW 行为是发出 FATAL_ERROR 。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to set <tgt>_LIB_DEPENDS cache entries. The NEW behavior for this policy is to not set them.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是设置 <tgt>_LIB_DEPENDS 缓存条目。此策略的 NEW 行为是不设置它们。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to set OpenGL_GL_PREFERENCE to LEGACY. The NEW behavior for this policy is to set OpenGL_GL_PREFERENCE to GLVND.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是将 OpenGL_GL_PREFERENCE 设置为 LEGACY 。此策略的 NEW 行为是将 OpenGL_GL_PREFERENCE 设置为 GLVND 。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to silently ignore non-existent dependencies. The NEW behavior for this policy is to report an error if non-existent dependencies are listed in the add_dependencies() command.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是静默忽略不存在的依赖关系。如果 add_dependencies() 命令中列出了不存在的依赖项，则此策略的 NEW 行为是报告错误。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to silently remove leading and trailing whitespace. The NEW behavior for this policy is to diagnose the existence of such whitespace as an error. The setting for this policy used when checking the library names is that in effect when the target is created by an add_executable() or add_library() command.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是静默删除开头和结尾的空格。此策略的 NEW 行为是将空白的存在诊断为错误。检查库名称时使用的该策略设置是由 add_executable() 或 add_library() 命令创建目标时生效的设置。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to use compiler id Clang. The NEW behavior for this policy is to use compiler id AppleClang.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是使用编译器ID Clang 。此策略的 NEW 行为是使用编译器ID AppleClang 。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to use compiler id XL. The NEW behavior for this policy is to use compiler id XLClang.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是使用编译器ID XL 。此策略的 NEW 行为是使用编译器ID XLClang 。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy is to use the GNU compiler id for the qcc and QCC compiler drivers. The NEW behavior for this policy is to use the QCC compiler id for those drivers.
trans-unit.target: 该策略的 OLD 行为是对qcc和QCC编译器驱动程序使用 GNU 编译器ID。此策略的 NEW 行为是为那些驱动程序使用 QCC 编译器ID。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy relies on UseSWIG_TARGET_NAME_PREFERENCE variable that can be used to specify an explicit preference. The value may be one of:
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为取决于 UseSWIG_TARGET_NAME_PREFERENCE 变量，该变量可用于指定显式首选项。该值可以是以下之一：

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior for this policy set value VERSION for variables Python3_FIND_STRATEGY, Python2_FIND_STRATEGY and Python_FIND_STRATEGY.
trans-unit.target: 变量 Python3_FIND_STRATEGY ， Python2_FIND_STRATEGY 和 Python_FIND_STRATEGY 的此策略设置值 VERSION 的 OLD 行为。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior of a policy is deprecated by definition and may be removed in a future version of CMake.
trans-unit.target: 策略的 OLD 行为 deprecated by definition 并且在以后的CMake版本中可能会删除。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior of a policy is deprecated by definition and may be removed in a future version of CMake.
trans-unit.target: 策略的 OLD 行为 deprecated by definition 并且在以后的CMake版本中可能会删除。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior of this policy drops leading zeros in all components, e.g. such that version 1.07.06 becomes 1.7.6. The NEW behavior of this policy preserves the leading zeros in all components, such that version 1.07.06 remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为在所有组件中均删除前导零，例如，版本 1.07.06 变为 1.7.6 。此策略的 NEW 行为保留所有组件中的前导零，从而使 1.07.06 版保持不变。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior of this policy is for install(CODE) and install(SCRIPT) to not evaluate generator expressions. The NEW behavior is to evaluate generator expressions for install(CODE) and install(SCRIPT).
trans-unit.target: 该策略的 OLD 行为是 install(CODE) 和 install(SCRIPT) 不评估生成器表达式。在 NEW 行为是评估发电机表达式 install(CODE) 和 install(SCRIPT) 。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior of this policy is for Documentation to add cache variables and find VTK documentation dependent packages. The NEW behavior is to act as an empty module.
trans-unit.target: 该策略的 OLD 行为是用于 Documentation 添加缓存变量并查找VTK文档相关的程序包。在 NEW 行为是作为一个空的模块。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior of this policy is for FindQt to exist for find_package(). The NEW behavior is to pretend that it doesn’t exist for find_package().
trans-unit.target: 对于 find_package() ，该策略的 OLD 行为是 FindQt 存在。 NEW 行为是假装 find_package() 不存在此行为。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior of this policy is for $<IN_LIST:...> to always return 0 if the first argument is empty. The NEW behavior is to return 1 if the first argument is empty and the list contains an empty item.
trans-unit.target: 如果第一个参数为空，则此策略的 OLD 行为是使 $<IN_LIST:...> 始终返回 0 。如果第一个参数为空并且列表包含空项目，则 NEW 行为将返回 1 。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior of this policy is to allow BundleUtilities to be included at configure time. The NEW behavior of this policy is to disallow such inclusion.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是允许在配置时包含 BundleUtilities 。此政策的 NEW 行为是禁止这种包含。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior of this policy is to always use the additional link flags when linking executables regardless of the value of the ENABLE_EXPORTS target property.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是在链接可执行文件时始终使用附加链接标志，而不管 ENABLE_EXPORTS 目标属性的值如何。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior of this policy is to disallow target_link_libraries() calls naming targets from another directory except in the previously accidentally allowed case of using the INTERFACE keyword only. The NEW behavior of this policy is to allow all such calls but use the new scoping rules.
trans-unit.target: 该策略的 OLD 行为是禁止 target_link_libraries() 调用另一个目录中的命名目标，除非先前偶然允许的情况下仅使用 INTERFACE 关键字。此策略的 NEW 行为是允许所有此类调用，但使用新的作用域规则。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior of this policy is to generate the location of an imported unknown, static or shared library target as <TARGET_NAME>-NOTFOUND if not set. The NEW behavior is to raise an error.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置，此策略的 OLD 行为是将导入的未知，静态或共享库目标的位置生成为 <TARGET_NAME>-NOTFOUND 。在 NEW 行为是引发错误。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior of this policy is to ignore config-specific flag variables like CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_DEBUG and only use CMake’s built-in defaults for the current compiler and platform.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是忽略配置特定的标志变量（例如 CMAKE_<LANG>_FLAGS_DEBUG ),而仅对当前的编译器和平台使用CMake的内置默认值。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior of this policy is to ignore language standard setting variables when generating the try_compile test project. The NEW behavior of this policy is to honor language standard setting variables.
trans-unit.target: 该策略的 OLD 行为是在生成 try_compile 测试项目时忽略语言标准设置变量。此策略的 NEW 行为是遵守语言标准设置变量。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior of this policy is to not escape RPATH entries in the intermediary cmake_install.cmake script. The NEW behavior is to properly escape coincidental CMake syntax in RPATH entries when generating the intermediary cmake_install.cmake script.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是不对中介 cmake_install.cmake 脚本中的 RPATH 条目进行转义。在 NEW 行为是正确逃生巧合CMake的语法 RPATH 产生的中介时，项 cmake_install.cmake 脚本。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior of this policy is to report a warning if an entry in the INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES of a generator-expression conditionally linked IMPORTED target does not exist.
trans-unit.target: 如果生成器表达式有条件链接的 IMPORTED 目标的 INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 中的条目不存在，则此策略的 OLD 行为是报告警告。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior of this policy is to still prevent add_test from handling whitespace and special characters properly (if not using the mentioned workaround). The NEW behavior on the other hand allows names with whitespace and special characters for tests created by add_test.
trans-unit.target: 此策略的 OLD 行为是仍然阻止 add_test 正确处理空格和特殊字符（如果未使用上述解决方法）。另一方面， NEW 行为允许带有空格和特殊字符的名称用于 add_test 创建的测试。

trans-unit.source: The OLD behavior of this policy is to use the RPATH settings for install_name on macOS. The NEW behavior of this policy is to ignore the RPATH settings for install_name on macOS.
trans-unit.target: 该策略的 OLD 行为是在macOS上为 install_name 使用 RPATH 设置。此策略的 NEW 行为是忽略macOS上 install_name 的 RPATH 设置。

trans-unit.source: The OPTIONAL keyword is a placeholder for future implementation and does not currently work. Instead you can use the CheckLanguage module to verify support before enabling.
trans-unit.target: 该 OPTIONAL 关键字是未来实施的占位符和目前不工作。相反，您可以在启用之前使用 CheckLanguage 模块来验证支持。

trans-unit.source: The OSX_ARCHITECTURES property sets the target binary architecture for targets on macOS (-arch). This property is initialized by the value of the variable CMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES if it is set when a target is created. Use OSX_ARCHITECTURES_<CONFIG> to set the binary architectures on a per-configuration basis, where <CONFIG> is an upper-case name (e.g. OSX_ARCHITECTURES_DEBUG).
trans-unit.target: 该 OSX_ARCHITECTURES 属性设置为目标，在MacOS目标二进制架构（ -arch ）。如果在创建目标时设置了此属性，则通过变量 CMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES 的值来初始化此属性。使用 OSX_ARCHITECTURES_<CONFIG> 以每个配置为基础设置二进制体系结构，其中 <CONFIG> 是大写名称（例如 OSX_ARCHITECTURES_DEBUG ）。

trans-unit.source: The PARSE_ARGV signature is only for use in a function() body. In this case the arguments that are parsed come from the ARGV# variables of the calling function. The parsing starts with the <N>-th argument, where <N> is an unsigned integer. This allows for the values to have special characters like ; in them.
trans-unit.target: 该 PARSE_ARGV 签名是仅适用于一个使用 function() 体。在这种情况下，解析的参数来自调用函数的 ARGV# 变量。解析从第 <N> 个参数开始，其中 <N> 是无符号整数。这允许值具有特殊字符，例如 ; 在他们之中。

trans-unit.source: The POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE property determines whether position independent executables or shared libraries will be created. This property is True by default for SHARED and MODULE library targets and False otherwise. This property is initialized by the value of the CMAKE_POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE variable if it is set when a target is created.
trans-unit.target: 所述 POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE 属性确定位置独立的可执行文件或共享库中是否将被创建。对于 SHARED 和 MODULE 库目标，此属性默认为 True ，否则为 False 。如果在创建目标时设置了此属性，则通过 CMAKE_POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE 变量的值来初始化此属性。

trans-unit.source: The PRE_INSTALL_SCRIPT and POST_INSTALL_SCRIPT properties are the old way to specify CMake scripts to run before and after installing a target. They are used only when the old INSTALL_TARGETS command is used to install the target. Use the install() command instead.
trans-unit.target: 该 PRE_INSTALL_SCRIPT 和 POST_INSTALL_SCRIPT 性能之前和安装目标后指定CMake的脚本运行的老路上。仅当使用旧的 INSTALL_TARGETS 命令安装目标时才使用它们。请改用 install() 命令。

trans-unit.source: The PROGRAMS form is identical to the FILES form except that the default permissions for the installed file also include OWNER_EXECUTE, GROUP_EXECUTE, and WORLD_EXECUTE. This form is intended to install programs that are not targets, such as shell scripts. Use the TARGETS form to install targets built within the project.
trans-unit.target: 所述 PROGRAMS 形式是相同的 FILES 除了所安装的文件的默认权限还包括形式 OWNER_EXECUTE ， GROUP_EXECUTE ，和 WORLD_EXECUTE 。此表单旨在安装非目标程序，例如shell脚本。使用 TARGETS 表单安装在项目内构建的目标。

trans-unit.source: The PUBLIC, PRIVATE and INTERFACE keywords can be used to specify both the link dependencies and the link interface in one command. Libraries and targets following PUBLIC are linked to, and are made part of the link interface. Libraries and targets following PRIVATE are linked to, but are not made part of the link interface. Libraries following INTERFACE are appended to the link interface and are not used for linking <target>.
trans-unit.target: 该 PUBLIC ， PRIVATE 和 INTERFACE 关键字可用于指定链接的依赖性和在一个命令链路接口两种。 PUBLIC 之后的库和目标已链接到链接接口，并成为链接接口的一部分。 PRIVATE 之后的库和目标已链接到链接接口，但未成为链接接口的一部分。 INTERFACE 之后的库被附加到链接接口，并且不用于链接 <target> 。

trans-unit.source: The Python3_FIND_ABI variable is a 3-tuple specifying, in that order, pydebug (d), pymalloc (m) and unicode (u) flags. Each element can be set to one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 所述 Python3_FIND_ABI 变量是一个3元组指定，按照该顺序， pydebug （ d ）， pymalloc （ m ）和 unicode （ u ）标志。可以将每个元素设置为以下之一：

trans-unit.source: The Python_FIND_ABI variable is a 3-tuple specifying, in that order, pydebug (d), pymalloc (m) and unicode (u) flags. Each element can be set to one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 所述 Python_FIND_ABI 变量是一个3元组指定，按照该顺序， pydebug （ d ）， pymalloc （ m ）和 unicode （ u ）标志。可以将每个元素设置为以下之一：

trans-unit.source: The QUIET option can be given to hide the output associated with populating the specified content. If the population fails, the output will be shown regardless of whether this option was given or not so that the cause of the failure can be diagnosed. The global FETCHCONTENT_QUIET cache variable has no effect on FetchContent_Populate() calls where the content details are provided directly.
trans-unit.target: 该 QUIET 可以给出选项，隐藏填充指定的内容相关联的输出。如果填充失败，则无论是否给出此选项，都将显示输出，以便可以诊断失败的原因。全局 FETCHCONTENT_QUIET 缓存变量对直接提供内容详细信息的 FetchContent_Populate() 调用无效。

trans-unit.source: The REALPATH and PROGRAM subcommands had been superseded, respectively, by file(REAL_PATH) and separate_arguments(PROGRAM) commands.
trans-unit.target: 的 REALPATH 和 PROGRAM 子命令已被取代，分别由文件（REAL_PATH）和 separate_arguments(PROGRAM) 命令。

trans-unit.source: The RELEASE variant should be listed first in the property so that the variant is chosen if the user uses a configuration which is not an exact match for any listed IMPORTED_CONFIGURATIONS.
trans-unit.target: 在 RELEASE 变体应首先在属性中列出，这样，如果用户使用一个配置，它不是任何列出的精确的匹配选择所述变体 IMPORTED_CONFIGURATIONS 。

trans-unit.source: The RESOURCE_GROUPS property is a semicolon-separated list of group descriptions. Each entry consists of an optional number of groups using the description followed by a series of resource requirements for those groups. These requirements (and the number of groups) are separated by commas. The resource requirements consist of the name of a resource type, followed by a colon, followed by an unsigned integer specifying the number of slots required on one resource of the given type.
trans-unit.target: 所述 RESOURCE_GROUPS 属性是分号分隔的列表组描述。每个条目均包含使用说明的可选数量的组，然后是这些组的一系列资源要求。这些要求（和组数）用逗号分隔。资源要求由资源类型的名称，后跟冒号，无符号整数组成，该整数指定给定类型的一种资源上所需的插槽数。

trans-unit.source: The RESOURCE_GROUPS property tells CTest what resources a test expects to use grouped in a way meaningful to the test. The test itself must read the environment variables to determine which resources have been allocated to each group. For example, each group may correspond to a process the test will spawn when executed.
trans-unit.target: 该 RESOURCE_GROUPS 属性告诉CTEST测试预计在某种程度上有意义的测试中使用的分组哪些资源。测试本身必须读取环境变量，以确定哪些资源已分配给每个组。例如，每个组可能对应于测试在执行时将产生的过程。

trans-unit.source: The RESOURCE_GROUPS property tells CTest what resources a test expects to use grouped in a way meaningful to the test. The test itself must read the environment variables to determine which resources have been allocated to each group. For example, each group may correspond to a process the test will spawn when executed.
trans-unit.target: 该 RESOURCE_GROUPS 属性告诉CTEST测试预计在某种程度上有意义的测试中使用的分组哪些资源。测试本身必须读取环境变量，以确定哪些资源已分配给每个组。例如，每个组可能对应于测试在执行时将产生的过程。

trans-unit.source: The REUSE_FROM form requires the same set of compiler options, compiler flags and compiler definitions for both <target> and <other_target>. Some compilers (e.g. GCC) may issue a warning if the precompiled header file cannot be used (-Winvalid-pch).
trans-unit.target: 所述 REUSE_FROM 形式需要两个相同的组的编译选项，编译器标记和编译器定义 <target> 和 <other_target> 。如果无法使用预编译的头文件（ -Winvalid-pch ），则某些编译器（例如GCC）可能会发出警告。

trans-unit.source: The SCRIPT form will invoke the given CMake script files during installation. If the script file name is a relative path it will be interpreted with respect to the current source directory. The CODE form will invoke the given CMake code during installation. Code is specified as a single argument inside a double-quoted string. For example, the code
trans-unit.target: 该 SCRIPT 安装过程中的形式将调用指定的CMake的脚本文件。如果脚本文件名是相对路径，则将相对于当前源目录进行解释。该 CODE 在安装过程中的形式将调用给CMake的代码。将代码指定为双引号字符串内的单个参数。例如，代码

trans-unit.source: The SOURCE_DIR and BINARY_DIR arguments are supported by ExternalProject_Add(), but different default values are used by FetchContent_Populate(). SOURCE_DIR defaults to ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/<lcName>-src and BINARY_DIR defaults to ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/<lcName>-build. If a relative path is specified, it will be interpreted as relative to CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR.
trans-unit.target: 该 SOURCE_DIR 和 BINARY_DIR 参数通过支持 ExternalProject_Add() ，但不同的默认值是通过使用 FetchContent_Populate() 。 SOURCE_DIR 默认为 ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/<lcName>-src 而 BINARY_DIR 默认为 ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/<lcName>-build 。如果指定了相对路径，它将被解释为相对于 CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR 。

trans-unit.source: The SOURCE_DIR, BINARY_DIR and POPULATED options can be used to specify which properties should be retrieved. Each option accepts a value which is the name of the variable in which to store that property. Most of the time though, only <name> is given, in which case the call will then set the same variables as a call to FetchContent_Populate(name). This allows the following canonical pattern to be used, which ensures that the relevant variables will always be defined regardless of whether or not the population has been performed elsewhere in the project already:
trans-unit.target: 的 SOURCE_DIR ， BINARY_DIR 和 POPULATED 选项可用于指定哪些属性应该被检索。每个选项都接受一个值，该值是存储该属性的变量的名称。但是，在大多数情况下，仅给出 <name> ，在这种情况下，该调用将设置与 FetchContent_Populate(name) 调用相同的变量。这允许使用以下规范模式，这可以确保始终定义相关变量，而不管是否已经在项目中的其他地方进行过填充：

trans-unit.source: The SOURCE_SUBDIR option can be given in the declared details to instruct FetchContent_MakeAvailable() to look for a CMakeLists.txt file in a subdirectory below the top level (i.e. the same way that SOURCE_SUBDIR is used by the ExternalProject_Add() command). SOURCE_SUBDIR must always be a relative path. See the next section for an example of this option.
trans-unit.target: 该 SOURCE_SUBDIR 选项可以在申报的细节给予指导 FetchContent_MakeAvailable() 寻找一个 CMakeLists.txt 文件中高层以下的子目录（即相同的方式， SOURCE_SUBDIR 使用由 ExternalProject_Add() 命令）。 SOURCE_SUBDIR 必须始终是相对路径。有关此选项的示例，请参见下一部分。

trans-unit.source: The STATIC_LIBRARY_FLAGS property, managed as a string, can be used to add extra flags to the link step of a static library target. STATIC_LIBRARY_FLAGS_<CONFIG> will add to the configuration <CONFIG>, for example, DEBUG, RELEASE, MINSIZEREL, RELWITHDEBINFO, …
trans-unit.target: 该 STATIC_LIBRARY_FLAGS 财产，管理作为一个字符串，可用于额外的标志添加到一个静态库目标的链接步骤。 STATIC_LIBRARY_FLAGS_<CONFIG> 将添加到配置 <CONFIG> 中，例如 DEBUG ， RELEASE ， MINSIZEREL ， RELWITHDEBINFO ……

trans-unit.source: The STEP_TARGETS and INDEPENDENT_STEP_TARGETS options for ExternalProject_Add() are generally the easiest way to ensure targets are created for specific steps of interest. For custom steps, ExternalProject_Add_StepTargets() must be called explicitly if a target should also be created for that custom step. An alternative to these two options is to populate the EP_STEP_TARGETS and EP_INDEPENDENT_STEP_TARGETS directory properties. These act as defaults for the step target options and can save having to repeatedly specify the same set of step targets when multiple external projects are being defined.
trans-unit.target: 通常， ExternalProject_Add() 的 STEP_TARGETS 和 INDEPENDENT_STEP_TARGETS 选项是确保为感兴趣的特定步骤创建目标的最简单方法。对于自定义步骤，如果还应为该自定义步骤创建目标，则必须显式调用 ExternalProject_Add_StepTargets() 。这两个选项的替代方法是填充 EP_STEP_TARGETS 和 EP_INDEPENDENT_STEP_TARGETS 目录属性。这些用作步骤目标选项的默认值，并且在定义多个外部项目时可以省去重复指定同一组步骤目标的麻烦。

trans-unit.source: The STEP_TARGETS option for ExternalProject_Add() is generally the easiest way to ensure targets are created for specific steps of interest. For custom steps, ExternalProject_Add_StepTargets() must be called explicitly if a target should also be created for that custom step. An alternative to these two options is to populate the EP_STEP_TARGETS directory property. It acts as a default for the step target options and can save having to repeatedly specify the same set of step targets when multiple external projects are being defined.
trans-unit.target: 通常， ExternalProject_Add() 的 STEP_TARGETS 选项是确保为感兴趣的特定步骤创建目标的最简单方法。对于自定义步骤，如果还应为该自定义步骤创建目标，则必须显式调用 ExternalProject_Add_StepTargets() 。这两个选项的替代方法是填充 EP_STEP_TARGETS 目录属性。它用作步骤目标选项的默认值，并且在定义多个外部项目时可以省去重复指定同一组步骤目标的麻烦。

trans-unit.source: The SUBBUILD_DIR argument can be provided to change the location of the sub-build created to perform the population. The default value is ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/<lcName>-subbuild and it would be unusual to need to override this default. If a relative path is specified, it will be interpreted as relative to CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR.
trans-unit.target: 该 SUBBUILD_DIR 可提供的参数来改变创建执行人口子构建的位置。默认值为 ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/<lcName>-subbuild ，通常需要覆盖此默认值。如果指定了相对路径，它将被解释为相对于 CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR 。

trans-unit.source: The SUBBUILD_DIR argument can be provided to change the location of the sub-build created to perform the population. The default value is ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/<lcName>-subbuild and it would be unusual to need to override this default. If a relative path is specified, it will be interpreted as relative to CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR. This option should not be confused with the SOURCE_SUBDIR option which only affects the FetchContent_MakeAvailable() command.
trans-unit.target: 该 SUBBUILD_DIR 可提供的参数来改变创建执行人口子构建的位置。默认值为 ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/<lcName>-subbuild ，通常需要覆盖此默认值。如果指定了相对路径，它将被解释为相对于 CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR 。此选项不应与 SOURCE_SUBDIR 选项混淆，后者只会影响 FetchContent_MakeAvailable() 命令。

trans-unit.source: The TARGETS form specifies rules for installing targets from a project. There are several kinds of target Output Artifacts that may be installed:
trans-unit.target: 在 TARGETS 形成了从项目安装目标指定的规则。可能会安装几种目标输出工件：

trans-unit.source: The TARGETS form specifies rules for installing targets from a project. There are several kinds of target files that may be installed:
trans-unit.target: 在 TARGETS 形成了从项目安装目标指定的规则。可能会安装几种目标文件：

trans-unit.source: The TEST operator was added to the if() command to determine if a given test name was created by the add_test() command.
trans-unit.target: 在 TEST 操作者加入到 if() 命令，以确定是否一个给定的测试名称是由创建 add_test() 命令。

trans-unit.source: The TO_CMAKE_PATH mode converts a native <path> into a cmake-style path with forward-slashes (/). The input can be a single path or a system search path like $ENV{PATH}. A search path will be converted to a cmake-style list separated by ; characters.
trans-unit.target: 所述 TO_CMAKE_PATH 模式转换天然 <path> 与正向斜杠（一个cmake的风格的路径 / ）。输入可以是单个路径，也可以是系统搜索路径，例如 $ENV{PATH} 。搜索路径将转换为cmake样式列表，并以 ; 分隔 字符。

trans-unit.source: The TO_NATIVE_PATH mode converts a cmake-style <path> into a native path with platform-specific slashes (\ on Windows and / elsewhere).
trans-unit.target: 所述 TO_NATIVE_PATH 模式转换一个cmake的风格的 <path> 与特定于平台的斜杠（天然路径 \ Windows和 / 其他地方）。

trans-unit.source: The TRANSFORM sub-command does not change the number of elements in the list. If a <SELECTOR> is specified, only some elements will be changed, the other ones will remain the same as before the transformation.
trans-unit.target: 在 TRANSFORM 子命令不更改列表中元素的个数。如果指定了 <SELECTOR> ，则仅会更改某些元素，而其他元素将保持与转换之前相同。

trans-unit.source: The VERBOSE option enables verbose output for the archive operation.
trans-unit.target: 该 VERBOSE 选项启用详细的归档操作输出。

trans-unit.source: The VISIBILITY_INLINES_HIDDEN property determines whether a flag for hiding symbols for inline functions, such as -fvisibility-inlines-hidden, should be used when invoking the compiler. This property affects compilation in sources of all types of targets (subject to policy CMP0063).
trans-unit.target: 所述 VISIBILITY_INLINES_HIDDEN 属性决定是否用于内联函数，诸如隐藏符号标志 -fvisibility-inlines-hidden ，应调用编译器时使用。此属性影响所有类型目标的源中的编译（取决于策略 CMP0063 ）。

trans-unit.source: The VULKAN_SDK environment variable optionally specifies the location of the Vulkan SDK root directory for the given architecture. It is typically set by sourcing the toplevel setup-env.sh script of the Vulkan SDK directory into the shell environment.
trans-unit.target: 所述 VULKAN_SDK 环境变量任选指定福尔康SDK根目录对于给定体系结构的位置。通常是通过将Vulkan SDK目录的顶级 setup-env.sh 脚本采购到Shell环境中来设置的。

trans-unit.source: The WHAT option is the only mandatory option. Here you specify what information will be printed:
trans-unit.target: 该 WHAT 选项是唯一必要的选项。在此指定要打印的信息：

trans-unit.source: The [version] argument requests a version with which the package found should be compatible (format is major[.minor[.patch[.tweak]]]). The EXACT option requests that the version be matched exactly. If no [version] and/or component list is given to a recursive invocation inside a find-module, the corresponding arguments are forwarded automatically from the outer call (including the EXACT flag for [version]). Version support is currently provided only on a package-by-package basis (see the Version Selection section below).
trans-unit.target: 的 [version] 参数请求一个版本与该包中找到应兼容（格式为 major[.minor[.patch[.tweak]]] ）。该 EXACT 选项要求的版本完全匹配。如果未向find-module内的递归调用提供 [version] 和/或组件列表，则将从外部调用（包括 [version] 的 EXACT 标志）自动转发相应的参数。当前仅在逐个软件包的基础上提供版本支持（请参阅下面的“ 版本选择”部分）。

trans-unit.source: The [version] argument requests a version with which the package found should be compatible. There are two possible forms in which it may be specified:
trans-unit.target: 的 [version] 参数请求与该包中应该是兼容的版本。有两种可能的形式可以指定：

trans-unit.source: The add_jar() function sets the following target properties on <target_name>:
trans-unit.target: 所述 add_jar() 函数设置在以下目标属性 <target_name> ：

trans-unit.source: The android_add_test_data function is used to copy files and libraries needed to run project-specific tests. On the host operating system, this is done at build time. For on-device testing, the files are loaded onto the device by the manufactured test at run time.
trans-unit.target: 该 android_add_test_data 功能用于复制需要运行特定项目的测试文件和库。在主机操作系统上，这是在构建时完成的。对于设备上的测试，文件将在运行时通过制造的测试加载到设备上。

trans-unit.source: The auto-regeneration rule in top-build-dir/build.ninja must have an order-only dependency on sub/build.ninja.
trans-unit.target: top-build-dir/build.ninja 中的 auto-regeneration 规则必须对 sub/build.ninja 具有仅订购的依赖关系。

trans-unit.source: The cache object kind lists cache entries. These are the Variables stored in the persistent cache (CMakeCache.txt) for the build tree.
trans-unit.target: 该 cache 对象类型的列表缓存条目。这些是存储在构建树的持久性缓存（ CMakeCache.txt ）中的变量。

trans-unit.source: The check_required_components helper macro ensures that all requested, non-optional components have been found by checking the <Package>_<Component>_FOUND variables for all required components. This macro should be called at the end of the package configuration file even if the package does not have any components. This way, CMake can make sure that the downstream project hasn’t specified any non-existent components. If check_required_components fails, the <Package>_FOUND variable is set to FALSE, and the package is considered to be not found.
trans-unit.target: 该 check_required_components 帮手宏确保所有的要求，非可选组件已发现通过检查 <Package>_<Component>_FOUND 所有必需的组件的变量。即使程序包没有任何组件，也应在程序包配置文件的末尾调用此宏。这样，CMake可以确保下游项目没有指定任何不存在的组件。如果 check_required_components 失败，则将 <Package>_FOUND 变量设置为FALSE，并认为未找到该程序包。

trans-unit.source: The cmakeFiles object kind lists files used by CMake while configuring and generating the build system. These include the CMakeLists.txt files as well as included .cmake files.
trans-unit.target: 该 cmakeFiles 对象，同时配置和生成构建系统使用CMake的一种列表中的文件。这些文件包括 CMakeLists.txt 文件以及随附的 .cmake 文件。

trans-unit.source: The cmake_add_fortran_subdirectory function adds a subdirectory to a project that contains a fortran-only subproject. The module will check the current compiler and see if it can support fortran. If no fortran compiler is found and the compiler is MSVC, then this module will find the MinGW gfortran. It will then use an external project to build with the MinGW tools. It will also create imported targets for the libraries created. This will only work if the fortran code is built into a dll, so BUILD_SHARED_LIBS is turned on in the project. In addition the CMAKE_GNUtoMS option is set to on, so that Microsoft .lib files are created. Usage is as follows:
trans-unit.target: 该 cmake_add_fortran_subdirectory 功能增加了一个子目录包含只用Fortran子项目的项目。该模块将检查当前的编译器，并查看它是否可以支持fortran。如果未找到fortran编译器且编译器为MSVC，则此模块将找到MinGW gfortran。然后它将使用一个外部项目来使用MinGW工具进行构建。它还将为创建的库创建导入的目标。仅在将fortran代码内置到dll中时才有效，因此在项目中打开了 BUILD_SHARED_LIBS 。此外， CMAKE_GNUtoMS 选项设置为on，以便创建Microsoft .lib 文件。用法如下：

trans-unit.source: The cmake_minimum_required(VERSION) command implicitly invokes the cmake_policy(VERSION) command to specify that the current project code is written for the given range of CMake versions. All policies known to the running version of CMake and introduced in the <min> (or <max>, if specified) version or earlier will be set to use NEW behavior. All policies introduced in later versions will be unset. This effectively requests behavior preferred as of a given CMake version and tells newer CMake versions to warn about their new policies.
trans-unit.target: 该 cmake_minimum_required(VERSION) 命令隐含调用 cmake_policy(VERSION) 命令来指定当前项目代码为CMake的版本的给定范围内写入。 CMake的运行版本已知的所有策略，并且在 <min> （或 <max> ，如果指定的话）版本或更早版本中引入的所有策略都将设置为使用 NEW 行为。更高版本中引入的所有策略均未设置。这有效地请求了从给定CMake版本开始的首选行为，并告知较新的CMake版本警告其新策略。

trans-unit.source: The cmake_policy command is used to set policies to OLD or NEW behavior. While setting policies individually is supported, we encourage projects to set policies based on CMake versions:
trans-unit.target: 该 cmake_policy 命令用于设置策略以 OLD 或 NEW 行为。虽然支持分别设置策略，但我们鼓励项目根据CMake版本设置策略：

trans-unit.source: The codemodel object kind describes the build system structure as modeled by CMake.
trans-unit.target: 该 codemodel 对象类型的描述为蓝本由C进行编译系统结构。

trans-unit.source: The configure, build, test, and install steps are not.
trans-unit.target: 该 configure ， build ， test 和 install 步骤不是。

trans-unit.source: The continue command allows a cmake script to abort the rest of a block in a foreach() or while() loop, and start at the top of the next iteration.
trans-unit.target: 的 continue 命令允许cmake的脚本中止在一个块的其余部分 foreach() 或 while() 循环，并在下一迭代的顶部开始。

trans-unit.source: The create_javadoc() command can be used to create java documentation based on files or packages. For more details please read the javadoc manpage.
trans-unit.target: 该 create_javadoc() 命令可用于创建基于文件或包Java文档。有关更多详细信息，请阅读javadoc手册页。

trans-unit.source: The cxx_alignas feature provides a macro definition <PREFIX>_ALIGNAS which expands to either the standard alignas decorator or a compiler-specific decorator such as __attribute__ ((__aligned__)) used by GNU compilers.
trans-unit.target: 所述 cxx_alignas 特征提供了一个宏定义 <PREFIX>_ALIGNAS 其扩展为标准 alignas 装饰或特定编译器装饰如 __attribute__ ((__aligned__)) 由GNU编译器使用。

trans-unit.source: The cxx_alignof feature provides a macro definition <PREFIX>_ALIGNOF which expands to either the standard alignof decorator or a compiler-specific decorator such as __alignof__ used by GNU compilers.
trans-unit.target: 所述 cxx_alignof 特征提供了一个宏定义 <PREFIX>_ALIGNOF 其扩展为标准 alignof 装饰或特定编译器装饰如 __alignof__ 由GNU编译器使用。

trans-unit.source: The cxx_attribute_deprecated feature provides a macro definition <PREFIX>_DEPRECATED, which expands to either the standard [[deprecated]] attribute or a compiler-specific decorator such as __attribute__((__deprecated__)) used by GNU compilers.
trans-unit.target: 所述 cxx_attribute_deprecated 特征提供了一个宏定义 <PREFIX>_DEPRECATED ，其扩展为标准 [[deprecated]] 属性或编译器特定的装饰如 __attribute__((__deprecated__)) 所使用的GNU编译器。

trans-unit.source: The download, update, and patch steps are independent.
trans-unit.target: 该 download ， update 和 patch 的步骤是独立的。

trans-unit.source: The exe1 executable will be compiled with -DLIB1_WITH_EXE, while the shared_lib shared library will be compiled with -DLIB1_WITH_SHARED_LIB and -DCONSUMER_CMP0041_NEW, because policy CMP0041 is NEW at the point where the shared_lib target is created.
trans-unit.target: 该 exe1 可执行文件将被编译 -DLIB1_WITH_EXE ，而 shared_lib 共享库将被编译 -DLIB1_WITH_SHARED_LIB 和 -DCONSUMER_CMP0041_NEW ，因为政策 CMP0041 是 NEW 的，其中点 shared_lib 创建目标。

trans-unit.source: The feature_summary() macro can be used to print information about enabled or disabled packages or features of a project. By default, only the names of the features/packages will be printed and their required version when one was specified. Use set_package_properties() to add more useful information, like e.g. a download URL for the respective package or their purpose in the project.
trans-unit.target: 该 feature_summary() 宏可用于打印有关启用或禁用包或项目的功能的信息。默认情况下，仅指定功能部件/程序包的名称及其要求的版本（指定名称）。使用 set_package_properties() 添加更多有用的信息，例如相应软件包的下载URL或它们在项目中的用途。

trans-unit.source: The find_dependency() macro wraps a find_package() call for a package dependency:

trans-unit.target: 所述 find_dependency 宏还设置 ClimbingStats_FOUND 到 False 如果依赖没有找到，与诊断，所述沿 ClimbingStats 包不能没有使用 Stats 软件包。

trans-unit.source: The find_dependency macro from the CMakeFindDependencyMacro module helps by propagating whether the package is REQUIRED, or QUIET, etc. The find_dependency macro also sets MathFunctions_FOUND to False if the dependency is not found, along with a diagnostic that the MathFunctions package cannot be used without the Stats package.
trans-unit.target: CMakeFindDependencyMacro 模块中的 find_dependency 宏可通过传播该软件包是 REQUIRED 还是 QUIET 等来提供帮助。如果未找到依赖项，则 find_dependency 宏还将 MathFunctions_FOUND 设置为 False ，并提供了诊断，指出没有 Stats 不能使用 MathFunctions 软件包包。

trans-unit.source: The giflib library, if found.
trans-unit.target: 该 giflib 库，如果发现。

trans-unit.source: The install() command generates a file, cmake_install.cmake, inside the build directory, which is used internally by the generated install target and by CPack. You can also invoke this script manually with cmake -P. This script accepts several variables:

trans-unit.source: The install_jar() function sets the INSTALL_DESTINATION target property on jars so installed. This property holds the <destination> as described above, and is used by install_jar_exports(). You can get this information with get_property() and the INSTALL_DESTINATION property key.
trans-unit.target: 该 install_jar() 函数集 INSTALL_DESTINATION 上坛子目标属性，以便安装。该属性如上所述保存 <destination> ，并由 install_jar_exports() 使用。您可以使用 get_property() 和 INSTALL_DESTINATION 属性键获取此信息。

trans-unit.source: The jom tool is capable of reading makefiles of the NMake flavor and building in parallel, while the nmake tool always builds serially. After generating with the NMake Makefiles generator a user can run jom instead of nmake. The --build mode would also use jom if the CMAKE_MAKE_PROGRAM was set to jom while using the NMake Makefiles generator, and as a convenience, the NMake Makefiles JOM generator is provided to find jom in the normal way and use it as the CMAKE_MAKE_PROGRAM. For completeness, nmake is an alternative tool which can process the output of the NMake Makefiles JOM generator, but doing so would be a pessimisation.
trans-unit.target: 该 jom 工具能够读取的makefile文件 NMake 风味和建设并行，而 nmake 工具总是建立串行。使用 jom NMake Makefiles 生成器生成后，用户可以运行jom而不是 nmake 。该 --build 模式也将使用 jom 如果 CMAKE_MAKE_PROGRAM 设置为 jom 同时使用 NMake Makefiles 生成器，并为方便起见， NMake Makefiles JOM 提供发电机找到 jom 以正常的方式，并用它作为 CMAKE_MAKE_PROGRAM 。为了完整 nmake ，nmake是一个替代工具，可以处理 NMake Makefiles JOM 生成器的输出，但是这样做是一种悲观。

trans-unit.source: The key=value pairs form a comma-separated list of options to specify generator-specific details of the toolset selection. Supported pairs are:
trans-unit.target: 的 key=value 对形成逗号分隔的选项列表来指定工具集选择的发电机的具体细节。支持的对是：

trans-unit.source: The kind member is a string specifying the object kind name. The version member is a JSON object with major and minor members specifying integer components of the object kind’s version. Additional top-level members are specific to each object kind.
trans-unit.target: 该 kind 成员是指定对象种类名称的字符串。该 version 成员是一个JSON对象 major 和 minor 成员指定整数的对象样的版本组件。其他顶级成员特定于每种对象类型。

trans-unit.source: The lib/cmake/<PackageName> directory will contain a file which is either named <PackageName>Config.cmake or <PackageName>-config.cmake. This is the entry point to the package for CMake. A separate optional file named <PackageName>ConfigVersion.cmake may also exist in the directory. This file is used by CMake to determine whether the version of the third party package satisfies uses of the find_package() command which specify version constraints. It is optional to specify a version when using find_package(), even if a ConfigVersion file is present.
trans-unit.target: 在 lib/cmake/<PackageName> 目录将包含一个其或者命名的文件 <PackageName>Config.cmake 或 <PackageName>-config.cmake 。这是CMake软件包的入口点。目录中还可能存在一个单独的可选文件，名为 <PackageName>ConfigVersion.cmake 。 CMake使用此文件来确定第三方软件包的版本是否满足指定版本约束的 find_package() 命令的使用。使用 find_package() 时，即使存在 ConfigVersion 文件，也可以指定版本。

trans-unit.source: The lib1 and lib2 requirements are not “compatible”. One of them requires that consumers are built as position-independent-code, while the other requires that consumers are not built as position-independent-code. Because exe2 links to both and they are in conflict, a CMake error message is issued:
trans-unit.target: 在 lib1 和 lib2 要求不“兼容”。其中一个要求将使用者构建为与位置无关的代码，而另一个则要求不将使用者构建为与位置无关的代码。由于 exe2 链接到两者并且它们存在冲突，因此会发出CMake错误消息：

trans-unit.source: The lib1 and lib2 requirements are not “compatible”. One of them requires that consumers are built as position-independent-code, while the other requires that consumers are not built as position-independent-code. Because exe2 links to both and they are in conflict, a diagnostic is issued.
trans-unit.target: 在 lib1 和 lib2 要求不“兼容”。其中一个要求将使用者构建为与位置无关的代码，而另一个则要求不将使用者构建为与位置无关的代码。由于 exe2 链接到两者，并且它们冲突，因此将发出诊断信息。

trans-unit.source: The lib1 requirement INTERFACE_POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE is not “compatible” with the POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE property of the exe1 target. The library requires that consumers are built as position-independent-code, while the executable specifies to not built as position-independent-code, so a diagnostic is issued.
trans-unit.target: 在 lib1 要求 INTERFACE_POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE 不“兼容”与 POSITION_INDEPENDENT_CODE 的财产 exe1 目标。该库要求将使用者构建为与位置无关的代码，而可执行文件指定不将其构建为与位置无关的代码，因此将发出诊断信息。

trans-unit.source: The lib path is always searched.
trans-unit.target: 该 lib 路径总是被搜索。

trans-unit.source: The macro command is very similar to the function() command. Nonetheless, there are a few important differences.
trans-unit.target: 的 macro 命令是非常相似的 function() 命令。尽管如此，还是有一些重要的区别。

trans-unit.source: The moc and uic tools are executed as part of a synthesized <ORIGIN>_autogencustom target generated by CMake. By default that <ORIGIN>_autogen target inherits the dependencies of the <ORIGIN> target (see AUTOGEN_ORIGIN_DEPENDS). Target dependencies may be added to the <ORIGIN>_autogen target by adding them to the AUTOGEN_TARGET_DEPENDS target property.
trans-unit.target: 的 moc 和 uic 工具作为合成的一部分执行 <ORIGIN>_autogen custom target 由CMake的生成。默认情况下该 <ORIGIN>_autogen 目标继承的依赖 <ORIGIN> 目标（见 AUTOGEN_ORIGIN_DEPENDS ）。可以通过将目标依赖项添加到 <ORIGIN>_autogen 目标中，方法是将它们添加到 AUTOGEN_TARGET_DEPENDS 目标属性中。

trans-unit.source: The moc command line will consume the COMPILE_DEFINITIONS and INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES target properties from the target it is being invoked for, and for the appropriate build configuration.
trans-unit.target: 的 moc 命令行将消耗 COMPILE_DEFINITIONS 和 INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 从它被调用用于目标对象的属性，以及用于相应的生成配置。

trans-unit.source: The moc_predefs.h file, which is generated in AUTOGEN_BUILD_DIR, is passed to moc as the argument to the --include option.
trans-unit.target: 的 moc_predefs.h 文件，这是在产生 AUTOGEN_BUILD_DIR ，被传递到 moc 作为参数向 --include 选项。

trans-unit.source: The protobuf_generate_cpp and protobuf_generate_python functions and add_executable() or add_library() calls only work properly within the same directory.
trans-unit.target: 该 protobuf_generate_cpp 和 protobuf_generate_python 功能和 add_executable() 或 add_library() 只调用同一目录下正常工作。

trans-unit.source: The set_and_check() macro should be used in configuration files instead of the normal set() command for setting directories and file locations. If a referenced file or directory does not exist, the macro will fail.
trans-unit.target: 所述 set_and_check() 宏应该在配置文件中，而不是正常的使用 set() 命令，用于设置的目录和文件的位置。如果引用的文件或目录不存在，则宏将失败。

trans-unit.source: The soname of an IMPORTED target of shared library type.
trans-unit.target: 所述 soname 一个的 IMPORTED 共享库类型的目标。

trans-unit.source: The string(FIND) subcommand treats all strings as ASCII-only characters. The index stored in <output_variable> will also be counted in bytes, so strings containing multi-byte characters may lead to unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: 该 string(FIND) 子命令将所有的字符串作为唯一的ASCII字符。存储在 <output_variable> 中的索引也将以字节为单位，因此包含多字节字符的字符串可能会导致意外结果。

trans-unit.source: The tgt filename.
trans-unit.target: 该 tgt 文件名。

trans-unit.source: The toolset specifies the toolset name. The selected toolset name is provided in the CMAKE_VS_PLATFORM_TOOLSET variable.
trans-unit.target: 该 toolset 指定工具集的名称。 CMAKE_VS_PLATFORM_TOOLSET 变量中提供了所选的工具集名称。

trans-unit.source: The write_compiler_detection_header function also creates compatibility code for other features which have standard equivalents. For example, the cxx_static_assert feature is emulated with a template and abstracted via the <PREFIX>_STATIC_ASSERT and <PREFIX>_STATIC_ASSERT_MSG function-macros.
trans-unit.target: 所述 write_compiler_detection_header 功能还对于具有标准等同的其他特征创建的兼容性代码。例如， cxx_static_assert 功能使用模板进行仿真，并通过 <PREFIX>_STATIC_ASSERT 和 <PREFIX>_STATIC_ASSERT_MSG 函数宏进行抽象。

trans-unit.target: 所述 xctest_add_bundle 函数创建名为<目标>一个XCTest束将测试目标<被试者>。受测试者支持的目标类型是Framework和App Bundle：

trans-unit.target: 在未覆盖的目录包含由发现任何未覆盖的文件 CTEST_EXTRA_COVERAGE_GLOB 。

trans-unit.source: The ccmake executable is the CMake curses interface. Project configuration settings may be specified interactively through this GUI. Brief instructions are provided at the bottom of the terminal when the program is running.
trans-unit.target: 该ccmake可执行文件是CMake的诅咒接口。可以通过此GUI交互地指定项目配置设置。程序运行时，在终端底部提供了简要说明。

trans-unit.source: The cmake-gui executable is the CMake GUI. Project configuration settings may be specified interactively. Brief instructions are provided at the bottom of the window when the program is running.
trans-unit.target: 该cmake的桂可执行文件是CMake的GUI。项目配置设置可以交互指定。程序运行时，在窗口底部提供了简要说明。

trans-unit.source: The cmake executable is the command-line interface of the cross-platform buildsystem generator CMake. The above Synopsis lists various actions the tool can perform as described in sections below.
trans-unit.target: 所述cmake的可执行文件是跨平台的构建系统CMake的发电机的命令行界面。上面的摘要列出了该工具可以执行的各种操作，如下节所述。

trans-unit.source: The cpack executable is the CMake packaging program. It generates installers and source packages in a variety of formats.
trans-unit.target: 该cpack可执行文件是CMake的包装程序。它生成各种格式的安装程序和源软件包。

trans-unit.source: The cpack program is steered by a configuration file written in the CMake language. Unless chosen differently through the command-line option --config, the file CPackConfig.cmake in the current directory is used.
trans-unit.target: 该cpack计划是由写在配置文件操纵 CMake language 。除非通过命令行选项 --config 进行了其他选择， CPackConfig.cmake 将使用当前目录中的文件CPackConfig.cmake。

trans-unit.source: The ctest executable is the CMake test driver program. CMake-generated build trees created for projects that use the enable_testing() and add_test() commands have testing support. This program will run the tests and report results.
trans-unit.target: 该CTEST可执行文件是CMake的测试的驱动程序。为使用 enable_testing() 和 add_test() 命令的项目创建的CMake生成的构建树具有测试支持。该程序将运行测试并报告结果。

trans-unit.source: The ALL flag indicates that all components be downloaded. Otherwise, only those components explicitly marked as DOWNLOADED or that have a specified ARCHIVE_FILE will be downloaded. Additionally, the ALL option implies ADD_REMOVE (unless NO_ADD_REMOVE is specified).
trans-unit.target: ALL标志表示所有的组件都会被下载,否则,只有那些明确标记为DOWNLOADED的组件或有指定ARCHIVE_FILE的组件才会被下载。否则,只有那些明确标记为DOWNLOADED的组件或有指定ARCHIVE_FILE的组件才会被下载。此外,ALL选项意味着ADD_REMOVE(除非指定了NO_ADD_REMOVE)。

trans-unit.target: BUILD_TESTING选项是由Dart模块创建的,用来决定是否应该启用测试支持。默认为ON。

trans-unit.source: The CMake Cache
trans-unit.target: CMake Cache

trans-unit.source: The CMake command-line tool displays STATUS to TRACE messages on stdout with the message preceded by two hyphens and a space. All other message types are sent to stderr and are not prefixed with hyphens. The CMake GUI displays all messages in its log area. The curses interface shows STATUS to TRACE messages one at a time on a status line and other messages in an interactive pop-up box. The --log-level command-line option to each of these tools can be used to control which messages will be shown. To make a log level persist between CMake runs, the CMAKE_MESSAGE_LOG_LEVEL variable can be set instead. Note that the command line option takes precedence over the cache variable.
trans-unit.target: CMake命令行工具在stdout上显示 STATUS to TRACE 消息，该消息前面带有两个连字符和一个空格。所有其他消息类型都发送到stderr，并且不带连字符前缀。该 CMake GUI 显示在其日志区域的所有消息。该 curses interface 显示 STATUS ，以 TRACE 一个邮件在一个互动的弹出框状态行和其他信息的时间。这些工具中的每个工具的 --log-level 命令行选项都可用于控制显示哪些消息。为了使日志级别在CMake运行之间持续存在， CMAKE_MESSAGE_LOG_LEVEL 可以设置变量。请注意，命令行选项优先于缓存变量。

trans-unit.source: The CMake command-line tool displays STATUS to TRACE messages on stdout with the message preceded by two hyphens and a space. All other message types are sent to stderr and are not prefixed with hyphens. The CMake GUI displays all messages in its log area. The curses interface shows STATUS to TRACE messages one at a time on a status line and other messages in an interactive pop-up box. The --loglevel command-line option to each of these tools can be used to control which messages will be shown.
trans-unit.target: CMake命令行工具在stdout上显示 STATUS to TRACE 消息，该消息前面带有两个连字符和一个空格。所有其他消息类型都发送到stderr，并且不带连字符前缀。该 CMake GUI 显示在其日志区域的所有消息。该 curses interface 显示 STATUS ，以 TRACE 一个邮件在一个互动的弹出框状态行和其他信息的时间。这些工具中的每个工具的 --loglevel 命令行选项可用于控制显示哪些消息。

trans-unit.source: The CMake file-based API reports semantic information about the build system using the following kinds of JSON objects. Each kind of object is versioned independently using semantic versioning with major and minor components. Every kind of object has the form:
trans-unit.target: 基于文件的 CMake API 使用以下种类的 JSON 对象报告有关构建系统的语义信息。每一种对象都是独立的版本,使用主要和次要组件的语义版本管理。每一种对象都有这样的形式。

trans-unit.source: The CMake files shipped with a software package may also define boolean toggle options using the option() command. The command creates a cache entry which has a help text and a default value. Such cache entries are typically specific to the provided software and affect the configuration of the build, such as whether tests and examples are built, whether to build with exceptions enabled etc.
trans-unit.target: 软件包附带的CMake文件也可以使用 option() 命令定义布尔切换选项。该命令创建一个具有帮助文本和默认值的缓存条目。此类缓存条目通常特定于所提供的软件，并且会影响构建的配置，例如是否构建测试和示例，是否在启用了例外的情况下进行构建等。

trans-unit.source: The CMake fragment will generate a file in the ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} called somelib_export.h containing the macros SOMELIB_EXPORT, SOMELIB_NO_EXPORT, SOMELIB_DEPRECATED, SOMELIB_DEPRECATED_EXPORT and SOMELIB_DEPRECATED_NO_EXPORT. They will be followed by content taken from the variable specified by the CUSTOM_CONTENT_FROM_VARIABLE option, if any. The resulting file should be installed with other headers in the library.
trans-unit.target: CMake片段将在 ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} 生成一个名为 somelib_export.h 的文件，其中包含宏 SOMELIB_EXPORT ， SOMELIB_NO_EXPORT ， SOMELIB_DEPRECATED ， SOMELIB_DEPRECATED_EXPORT 和 SOMELIB_DEPRECATED_NO_EXPORT 宏。它们之后将是从 CUSTOM_CONTENT_FROM_VARIABLE 选项指定的变量中获取的内容（如果有）。生成的文件应与库中的其他标头一起安装。

trans-unit.source: The CMake source tree itself contains a CPACK_PROJECT_CONFIG_FILE. See the top level file CMakeCPackOptions.cmake.in for an example.
trans-unit.target: CMake源代码树本身包含一个 CPACK_PROJECT_CONFIG_FILE 。有关示例，请参见顶级文件 CMakeCPackOptions.cmake.in 。

trans-unit.source: The CMake tooling may report errors to the user when processing provided CMake files, such as reporting that the compiler is not supported, or the compiler does not support a required compile option, or a dependency can not be found. These errors must be resolved by the user by choosing a different compiler, installing dependencies, or instructing CMake where to find them, etc.
trans-unit.target: 在处理提供的CMake文件时，CMake工具可能会向用户报告错误，例如报告不支持编译器，或者编译器不支持所需的编译选项，或者找不到依赖项。这些错误必须由用户通过选择其他编译器， installing dependencies 或指示CMake在哪里找到它们等来解决。

trans-unit.source: The CMake tooling may report warnings which are intended for the provider of the software, not intended for the consumer of the software. Such warnings end with “This warning is for project developers”. Users may disable such warnings by passing the -Wno-dev flag to cmake(1).
trans-unit.target: CMake工具可能会报告警告，警告是针对软件提供者的，而不是针对软件消费者的。此类警告以“此警告针对项目开发人员”结尾。用户可以通过将 -Wno-dev 标志传递给 cmake(1) 来禁用此类警告。

trans-unit.source: The CMake tutorial provides a step-by-step guide that covers common build system issues that CMake helps address. Seeing how various topics all work together in an example project can be very helpful. The tutorial documentation and source code for examples can be found in the Help/guide/tutorial directory of the CMake source code tree. Each step has its own subdirectory containing code that may be used as a starting point. The tutorial examples are progressive so that each step provides the complete solution for the previous step.
trans-unit.target: CMake教程提供了分步指南，其中涵盖了CMake可以解决的常见构建系统问题。了解示例项目中各个主题如何协同工作将非常有帮助。示例的教程文档和源代码可以在CMake源代码树的 Help/guide/tutorial 目录中找到。每个步骤都有其自己的子目录，其中包含可以用作起点的代码。教程示例是渐进式的，因此每个步骤都为上一步提供了完整的解决方案。

trans-unit.source: The CMake variable CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX is used to determine the root of where the files will be installed. If using the cmake --install command, the installation prefix can be overridden via the --prefix argument. For example:
trans-unit.target: CMake变量 CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX 用于确定文件的安装根目录。如果使用 cmake --install 命令，则可以通过 --prefix 参数覆盖安装前缀。例如：

trans-unit.source: The CMake variable CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH specifies one or more directories to be prepended to all other search directories. This effectively “re-roots” the entire search under given locations. Paths which are descendants of the CMAKE_STAGING_PREFIX are excluded from this re-rooting, because that variable is always a path on the host system. By default the CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH is empty.
trans-unit.target: CMake变量 CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH 指定一个或多个要添加到所有其他搜索目录的目录。这样可以有效地“重新植根”给定位置下的整个搜索。 CMAKE_STAGING_PREFIX 的后代路径将从此重新生成根中排除，因为该变量始终是主机系统上的路径。默认情况下， CMAKE_FIND_ROOT_PATH 为空。

trans-unit.source: The CMake version string as three non-negative integer components separated by . and possibly followed by - and other information. The first two components represent the feature level and the third component represents either a bug-fix level or development date.
trans-unit.target: CMake版本字符串是由三个非负整数组成的，由分隔 . 并且可能后跟 - 和其他信息。前两个组件代表功能级别，第三个组件代表错误修复级别或开发日期。

trans-unit.source: The CPack module generates a file CPackConfig.cmake intended for use in a subsequent run of the cpack program where it steers the generation of installers or/and source packages.
trans-unit.target: CPack模块生成一个文件 CPackConfig.cmake ，该文件打算在 cpack 程序的后续运行中使用，在此文件中引导安装程序或/和源软件包的生成。

trans-unit.source: The CPack module generates the configuration files CPackConfig.cmake and CPackSourceConfig.cmake. They are intended for use in a subsequent run of the cpack program where they steer the generation of installers or/and source packages.
trans-unit.target: CPack模块生成配置文件 CPackConfig.cmake 和 CPackSourceConfig.cmake 。它们旨在在 cpack 程序的后续运行中使用，在此过程中引导安装程序或/和源软件包的生成。

trans-unit.source: The CPackComponent module is the module which handles the component part of CPack. See CPack module for general information about CPack.
trans-unit.target: CPackComponent模块是处理CPack组件部分的模块。有关CPack的一般信息,请参见CPack模块。

trans-unit.source: The Cobertura Coverage parser expects to read the coverage data from a single XML file which contains the coverage data for all modules. Cobertura has a program with the ability to merge given cobertura.ser files and then another program to generate a combined XML file from the previous merged file. For command line testing, this can be done by hand prior to CTest looking for the coverage files. For script builds, set the CTEST_COVERAGE_COMMAND variable to point to a file which will perform these same steps, such as a .sh or .bat file.
trans-unit.target: Cobertura Coverage解析器希望从单个XML文件中读取coverage数据，该XML文件包含所有模块的coverage数据。Cobertura的程序可以合并给定的 cobertura.ser 文件，然后再合并另一个程序，以从先前的合并文件生成合并的XML文件。对于命令行测试，可以在CTest查找覆盖率文件之前手动完成。对于脚本生成，将 CTEST_COVERAGE_COMMAND 变量设置为指向将执行这些步骤的文件，例如 .sh 或 .bat 文件。

trans-unit.source: The above “unquoted_legacy” production represents such arguments. We do not recommend using legacy unquoted arguments in new code. Instead use a Quoted Argument or a Bracket Argument to represent the content.
trans-unit.target: 上面的“ unquoted_legacy”产生表示这样的论点。我们不建议在新代码中使用旧的不带引号的参数。而是使用带引号的参数或括号的参数来表示内容。

trans-unit.source: The above command not only populates the content, it also adds it to the main build (if possible) so that the main build can use the populated project’s targets, etc. In some cases, the main project may need to have more precise control over the population or may be required to explicitly define the population steps (e.g. if CMake versions earlier than 3.14 need to be supported). The typical pattern of such custom steps looks like this:

trans-unit.source: The above example demonstrates how REQUIRED_FILES works, but it is not the most robust way to implement test ordering with failure detection. For that, test fixtures are a better alternative (see FIXTURES_REQUIRED).
trans-unit.target: 上面的示例演示了 REQUIRED_FILES 的工作方式，但这不是通过故障检测实现测试排序的最可靠方法。为此，测试治具是更好的选择（请参阅 FIXTURES_REQUIRED ）。

trans-unit.source: The above is such a common pattern that, where no custom steps are needed between the calls to FetchContent_Populate() and add_subdirectory(), equivalent logic can be obtained by calling FetchContent_MakeAvailable() instead (and should be preferred where it meets the needs of the project).
trans-unit.target: 上面是一种常见的模式，在调用 FetchContent_Populate() 和 add_subdirectory() 之间不需要自定义步骤的情况下，可以通过调用 FetchContent_MakeAvailable() 获得等效的逻辑（并且在满足以下要求时应首选）项目）。

trans-unit.source: The above is such a common pattern that, where no custom steps are needed between the calls to FetchContent_Populate() and add_subdirectory(), equivalent logic can be obtained by calling FetchContent_MakeAvailable() instead. Where it meets the needs of the project, FetchContent_MakeAvailable() should be preferred, as it is simpler and provides additional features over the pattern above.
trans-unit.target: 上面是一种常见的模式，在调用 FetchContent_Populate() 和 add_subdirectory() 之间不需要自定义步骤的情况下，可以通过调用 FetchContent_MakeAvailable() 获得等效的逻辑。在满足项目需求的地方，应该首选 FetchContent_MakeAvailable() ，因为它更简单并且提供了以上模式中的其他功能。

trans-unit.source: The above pattern allows other parts of the overall project hierarchy to re-use the same content and ensure that it is only populated once.
trans-unit.target: 上述模式允许整个项目层次结构中的其他部分重复使用相同的内容,并确保只填充一次。

trans-unit.source: The availability of a Find<PackageName>.cmake file does not indicate the availability of the binaries themselves.
trans-unit.target: 一个的可用性 Find<PackageName>.cmake 文件并不表示二进制文件本身的可用性。

trans-unit.source: The base name corresponds to the target PDB file name (see $<TARGET_PDB_FILE_NAME:tgt>) without prefix and suffix. For example, if target file name is base.pdb, the base name is base.
trans-unit.target: 基本名称对应于目标PDB文件名（请参见 $<TARGET_PDB_FILE_NAME:tgt> ），没有前缀和后缀。例如，如果目标文件名是 base.pdb ，则基本名是 base 。

trans-unit.source: The base name corresponds to the target file name (see $<TARGET_FILE_NAME:tgt>) without prefix and suffix. For example, if target file name is libbase.so, the base name is base.
trans-unit.target: 基本名称对应于目标文件名（请参见 $<TARGET_FILE_NAME:tgt> ），没有前缀和后缀。例如，如果目标文件名为 libbase.so ，则基础名称为 base 。

trans-unit.source: The base name corresponds to the target linker file name (see $<TARGET_LINKER_FILE_NAME:tgt>) without prefix and suffix. For example, if target file name is libbase.a, the base name is base.
trans-unit.target: 基本名称对应于目标链接程序文件名（请参见 $<TARGET_LINKER_FILE_NAME:tgt> ），没有前缀和后缀。例如，如果目标文件名为 libbase.a ，则基础名称为 base 。

trans-unit.source: The batch size needs to be selected carefully. If set too high, the size of the combined source files could result in the compiler using excessive memory or hitting other similar limits. In extreme cases, this can even result in build failure. On the other hand, if the batch size is too low, there will be little gain in build performance.
trans-unit.target: 批量大小需要谨慎选择。如果设置过高,合并后的源文件大小可能会导致编译器使用过多的内存或达到其他类似的限制。在极端情况下,甚至会导致构建失败。另一方面,如果批处理大小过低,则在构建性能上的增益将很小。

trans-unit.source: The behavior is to check CMAKE_BACKWARDS_COMPATIBILITY and present it to the user. The NEW behavior is to ignore CMAKE_BACKWARDS_COMPATIBILITY completely.
trans-unit.target: 行为是检查 CMAKE_BACKWARDS_COMPATIBILITY 并将其呈现给用户。在 NEW 行为是完全无视CMAKE_BACKWARDS_COMPATIBILITY。

trans-unit.source: The behavior of this command is the same as pkg_check_modules(), except that rather than checking for all the specified modules, it searches for just the first successful match.
trans-unit.target: 该命令的行为与 pkg_check_modules() 相同，除了命令不搜索所有指定的模块，而是仅搜索第一个成功的匹配项。

trans-unit.source: The boolean value of this property is TRUE for aliases to IMPORTED targets created with the GLOBAL options to add_executable() or add_library(), FALSE otherwise. It is undefined for targets built within the project.
trans-unit.target: 对于使用 add_executable() 或 add_library() 的 GLOBAL 选项创建的IMPORTED目标的别名，此属性的布尔值为 TRUE ，否则为 FALSE 。对于项目内构建的目标，它是未定义的。

trans-unit.source: The boolean value of this property is True for targets created with the IMPORTED option to add_executable() or add_library(). It is False for targets built within the project.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的布尔值是 True 与创建目标 IMPORTED 选项 add_executable() 或 add_library() 。对于在项目内构建的目标，它为 False 。

trans-unit.source: The boolean value of this property is True for targets created with the IMPORTEDGLOBAL options to add_executable() or add_library(). It is always False for targets built within the project.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的布尔值是真与创建目标 IMPORTED GLOBAL 选项 add_executable() 或 add_library() 。对于在项目内构建的目标始终为False。

trans-unit.source: The build configuration (eg, Debug, Release, Coverage).
trans-unit.target: 构建配置(例如,Debug、Release、Coverage)。

trans-unit.source: The buildsystem targets created by the add_library() and add_executable() commands create rules to create binary outputs. The exact output location of the binaries can only be determined at generate-time because it can depend on the build-configuration and the link-language of linked dependencies etc. TARGET_FILE, TARGET_LINKER_FILE and related expressions can be used to access the name and location of generated binaries. These expressions do not work for OBJECT libraries however, as there is no single file generated by such libraries which is relevant to the expressions.
trans-unit.target: 由 add_library() 和 add_executable() 命令创建的构建系统目标创建规则以创建二进制输出。二进制文件的确切输出位置只能在生成时确定，因为它可能取决于构建配置和链接依赖项的链接语言等 TARGET_FILE ， TARGET_LINKER_FILE 和相关表达式可用于访问文件的名称和位置。生成的二进制文件。但是，这些表达式不适用于 OBJECT 库，因为此类库不会生成与表达式相关的单个文件。

trans-unit.source: The cache entries may also have a type to signify how it should be presented in the user interface. For example, a cache entry of type BOOL can be edited by a checkbox in a user interface, a STRING can be edited in a text field, and a FILEPATH while similar to a STRING should also provide a way to locate filesystem paths using a file dialog. An entry of type STRING may provide a restricted list of allowed values which are then provided in a drop-down menu in the cmake-gui(1) user interface (see the STRINGS cache property).
trans-unit.target: 高速缓存条目还可以具有一种类型，以表示应如何在用户界面中呈现它。例如，可以通过用户界面中的复选框来编辑 BOOL 类型的缓存条目，可以在文本字段中编辑 STRING ，而 FILEPATH 与 STRING 类似，也应该提供一种使用文件来定位文件系统路径的方法。对话。类型 STRING 的条目可能会提供允许值的受限列表，然后在 cmake-gui(1) 用户界面的下拉菜单中提供这些值（请参阅 STRINGS 缓存属性）。

trans-unit.source: The check is only performed once, with the result cached in the variable named by <resultVar>. Every subsequent CMake run will re-use this cached value rather than performing the check again, even if the <code> changes. In order to force the check to be re-evaluated, the variable named by <resultVar> must be manually removed from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 该检查仅执行一次，结果缓存在 <resultVar> 命名的变量中。即使 <code> 更改，每次后续的CMake运行都将重用此缓存的值，而不是再次执行检查。为了强制对支票进行重新评估，必须从缓存中手动删除由 <resultVar> 命名的变量。

trans-unit.source: The cmake version suffix string.
trans-unit.target: cmake版本后缀字符串。

trans-unit.source: The cmake_add_component command describes an installation component, which the user can opt to install or remove as part of the graphical installation process. compname is the name of the component, as provided to the COMPONENT argument of one or more CMake INSTALL commands.
trans-unit.target: cmake_add_component命令描述了一个安装组件,用户可以选择安装或移除这个组件,作为图形安装过程的一部分。compname是组件的名称,提供给一个或多个CMake INSTALL命令的COMPONENT参数。

trans-unit.source: The combined coberturamerge.ser file is then used to generate the XML report using the cobertura-report program. The call to the cobertura-report program requires some named arguments.
trans-unit.target: 然后，使用 cobertura-report 程序将组合的 coberturamerge.ser 文件用于生成XML报告。调用cobertura-report程序需要一些命名参数。

trans-unit.source: The command find_package() operates without an explicit mode when the reduced signature is used without the MODULE option. In this case, by default, CMake first tries Module mode by searching for a Find<pkg>.cmake module. If it fails, CMake then searches for the package using Config mode.
trans-unit.target: 当使用不带 MODULE 选项的精简签名时，命令 find_package() 在没有显式模式的情况下运行。在这种情况下，默认情况下，CMake首先通过搜索 Find<pkg>.cmake 模块来尝试模块模式。如果失败，则CMake然后使用Config模式搜索软件包。

trans-unit.source: The command target_compile_options() adds target-specific options.
trans-unit.target: 命令 target_compile_options() 添加特定于目标的选项。

trans-unit.source: The command adds header files to the PRECOMPILE_HEADERS and/or INTERFACE_PRECOMPILE_HEADERS target properties of <target>. The named <target> must have been created by a command such as add_executable() or add_library() and must not be an ALIAS target.
trans-unit.target: 该命令将头文件添加到 <target> 的 PRECOMPILE_HEADERS 和/或 INTERFACE_PRECOMPILE_HEADERS 目标属性中。命名的 <target> 必须由诸如 add_executable() 或 add_library() 之类的命令创建，并且不能为ALIAS target。

trans-unit.source: The command also supports a second signature which can be used to specify that one target re-uses a precompiled header file artifact from another target instead of generating its own:
trans-unit.target: 该命令还支持第二个签名,可以用来指定一个目标重用另一个目标的预编译头文件构件,而不是生成自己的头文件。

trans-unit.source: The command and arguments are optional and if not specified an empty target will be created.
trans-unit.target: 命令和参数是可选的,如果没有指定,将创建一个空目标。

trans-unit.source: The command being run will be echo’ed to <where> with <where> being set to one of STDERR, STDOUT or NONE. See the CMAKE_EXECUTE_PROCESS_COMMAND_ECHO variable for a way to control the default behavior when this option is not present.
trans-unit.target: 将正在运行的命令回显到 <where> ， <where> 设置为 STDERR ， STDOUT 或 NONE 之一。请参见 CMAKE_EXECUTE_PROCESS_COMMAND_ECHO 变量，以获取不存在此选项时控制默认行为的方法。

trans-unit.source: The command has two modes by which it searches for packages: “Module” mode and “Config” mode. The above signature selects Module mode. If no module is found the command falls back to Config mode, described below. This fall back is disabled if the MODULE option is given.
trans-unit.target: 该命令有两种搜索包的模式：“模块”模式和“配置”模式。上面的签名选择模块模式。如果未找到模块，则命令将退回到配置模式，如下所述。如果指定了 MODULE 选项，则禁用此回退。

trans-unit.source: The command line to be executed by this custom step (generator expressions are supported). This option can be repeated multiple times to specify multiple commands to be executed in order.
trans-unit.target: 此自定义步骤要执行的命令行（支持 generator expressions ）。此选项可以重复多次以指定要按顺序执行的多个命令。

trans-unit.source: The command line, comment, working directory and byproducts of every standard and custom step are processed to replace the tokens <SOURCE_DIR>, <SOURCE_SUBDIR>, <BINARY_DIR>, <INSTALL_DIR><TMP_DIR>, <DOWNLOAD_DIR> and <DOWNLOADED_FILE> with their corresponding property values defined in the original call to ExternalProject_Add().
