trans-unit.source: The compression level can be specified with the COMPRESSION_LEVEL option. The <compression-level> should be between 0-9, with the default being 0. The COMPRESSION option must be present when COMPRESSION_LEVEL is given.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 COMPRESSION_LEVEL 选项指定压缩级别。所述 <compression-level> 应0-9之间，缺省设置为0。 COMPRESSION 选项时必须存在 COMPRESSION_LEVEL 中给出。

trans-unit.source: The concept of a fixture is different to that of a resource specified by RESOURCE_LOCK, but they may be used together. A fixture defines a set of tests which share setup and cleanup requirements, whereas a resource lock has the effect of ensuring a particular set of tests do not run in parallel. Some situations may need both, such as setting up a database, serialising test access to that database and deleting the database again at the end. For such cases, tests would populate both FIXTURES_REQUIRED and RESOURCE_LOCK to combine the two behaviours. Names used for RESOURCE_LOCK have no relationship with names of fixtures, so note that a resource lock does not imply a fixture and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 夹具的概念与 RESOURCE_LOCK 指定的资源的概念不同，但是可以一起使用。固定装置定义了一组共享设置和清除要求的测试，而资源锁定的作用是确保一组特定的测试不会并行运行。某些情况可能需要同时使用，例如设置数据库，序列化对该数据库的测试访问权限以及最后再次删除该数据库。对于这种情况，测试将同时填充 FIXTURES_REQUIRED 和 RESOURCE_LOCK 来组合这两种行为。用于 RESOURCE_LOCK 的名称与灯具的名称没有关系，因此请注意，资源锁并不意味着灯具，反之亦然。

trans-unit.source: The conditions inside the parenthesis are evaluated first and then the remaining condition is evaluated as in the previous examples. Where there are nested parenthesis the innermost are evaluated as part of evaluating the condition that contains them.
trans-unit.target: 小括号内的条件首先被评估,然后像前面的例子一样评估剩余的条件。当有嵌套小括号时,最里面的小括号作为评估包含小括号的条件的一部分进行评估。

trans-unit.source: The config files can usually be found in a directory whose name matches the pattern lib/cmake/<PackageName>, though they may be in other locations instead. The <PackageName> corresponds to use in CMake code with the find_package() command such as find_package(PackageName REQUIRED).
trans-unit.target: 配置文件通常可以在名称与模式 lib/cmake/<PackageName> 匹配的目录中找到，尽管它们可能位于其他位置。所述 <PackageName> 对应于CMake的代码与使用 find_package() 命令，如 find_package(PackageName REQUIRED) 。

trans-unit.source: The configure and test steps are optional. The arguments to this command line are the source and binary directories. The --build-generator option must be provided to use --build-and-test. If --test-command is specified then that will be run after the build is complete. Other options that affect this mode include:
trans-unit.target: 配置和测试步骤是可选的。此命令行的参数是源目录和二进制目录。该 --build-generator 选项必须提供使用 --build-and-test 。如果指定了 --test-command ，那么它将在构建完成后运行。影响此模式的其他选项包括：

trans-unit.source: The configure step is run after the download and update steps. By default, the external project is assumed to be a CMake project, but this can be overridden if required.
trans-unit.target: 配置步骤是在下载和更新步骤之后运行的。默认情况下,外部项目被假定为 CMake 项目,但如果需要的话,可以重写。

trans-unit.source: The content <name> can be any string without spaces, but good practice would be to use only letters, numbers and underscores. The name will be treated case-insensitively and it should be obvious for the content it represents, often being the name of the child project or the value given to its top level project() command (if it is a CMake project). For well-known public projects, the name should generally be the official name of the project. Choosing an unusual name makes it unlikely that other projects needing that same content will use the same name, leading to the content being populated multiple times.
trans-unit.target: 内容 <name> 可以是没有空格的任何字符串，但是好的做法是仅使用字母，数字和下划线。该名称将不区分大小写，并且对于它表示的内容应该是明显的，通常是子项目的名称或为其顶级 project() 命令（如果是CMake项目）提供的值。对于著名的公共项目，名称通常应为项目的正式名称。选择不寻常的名称会使需要相同内容的其他项目不太可能使用相同的名称，从而导致该内容被多次填充。

trans-unit.source: The contents of out will be: /path/to/cc;-c;main.c
trans-unit.target: out 的内容将是： /path/to/cc;-c;main.c

trans-unit.source: The contents of the INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES, COMPILE_DEFINITIONS and COMPILE_OPTIONS target properties are used appropriately when compiling the source files of a binary target.
trans-unit.target: 编译二进制目标的源文件时，将适当使用 INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES ， COMPILE_DEFINITIONS 和 COMPILE_OPTIONS 目标属性的内容。

trans-unit.source: The contents of the INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES, INTERFACE_COMPILE_DEFINITIONS and INTERFACE_COMPILE_OPTIONS target properties are Usage Requirements – they specify content which consumers must use to correctly compile and link with the target they appear on. For any binary target, the contents of each INTERFACE_ property on each target specified in a target_link_libraries() command is consumed:
trans-unit.target: 在内容 INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES ， INTERFACE_COMPILE_DEFINITIONS 和 INTERFACE_COMPILE_OPTIONS 目标属性是使用要求 -他们指定哪些用户必须使用正确编译和链接与他们出现在目标内容。对于任何二进制目标，都会消耗 target_link_libraries() 命令中指定的每个目标上每个 INTERFACE_ 属性的内容：

trans-unit.source: The contents of the INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES target property of imported targets are treated as SYSTEM includes by default. If this property is enabled on a target, compilation of sources in that target will not treat the contents of the INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES of consumed imported targets as system includes.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，导入目标的 INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 目标属性的内容被视为 SYSTEM include。如果在目标上启用了此属性，则该目标中的源编译将不会将消耗的导入目标的 INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 的内容视为系统包含的内容。

trans-unit.source: The contents of the generated Doxyfile can be customized by setting CMake variables before calling doxygen_add_docs(). Any variable with a name of the form DOXYGEN_<tag> will have its value substituted for the corresponding <tag> configuration option in the Doxyfile. See the Doxygen documentation for the full list of supported configuration options.
trans-unit.target: 可以在调用 doxygen_add_docs() 之前通过设置CMake变量来定制生成的 Doxyfile 的内容。名称形式为 DOXYGEN_<tag> 的任何变量都将用其值替换 Doxyfile 中相应的 <tag> 配置选项。有关支持的配置选项的完整列表，请参阅Doxygen文档。

trans-unit.source: The corresponding COMPILE_DEFINITIONS_<CONFIG> property may be set to specify per-configuration definitions. Generator expressions should be preferred instead of setting the alternative property.
trans-unit.target: 可以设置相应的 COMPILE_DEFINITIONS_<CONFIG> 属性以指定每个配置的定义。应该首选生成器表达式，而不是设置Alternative属性。

trans-unit.source: The corresponding changes to the source code are fairly straightforward. First, in tutorial.cxx, include the MathFunctions.h header if we need it:
trans-unit.target: 对源代码的相应更改非常简单。首先，在 tutorial.cxx 中，如果需要，请包含 MathFunctions.h 标头：

trans-unit.source: The cpack_add_component_group describes a group of installation components, which will be placed together within the listing of options. Typically, component groups allow the user to select/deselect all of the components within a single group via a single group-level option. Use component groups to reduce the complexity of installers with many options. groupname is an arbitrary name used to identify the group in the GROUP argument of the cpack_add_component command, which is used to place a component in a group. The name of the group must not conflict with the name of any component.
trans-unit.target: cpack_add_component_group描述了一组安装组件,它们将被放置在选项列表中。通常,组件组允许用户通过一个组级选项来选择/取消选择一个组中的所有组件。groupname是cpack_add_component命令的GROUP参数中用来标识组的任意名称,它用来将一个组件放置在一个组中。组的名称不能与任何组件的名称冲突。

trans-unit.source: The cpack_add_install_type command identifies a set of preselected components that represents a common use case for an application. For example, a “Developer” install type might include an application along with its header and library files, while an “End user” install type might just include the application’s executable. Each component identifies itself with one or more install types via the INSTALL_TYPES argument to cpack_add_component.
trans-unit.target: cpack_add_install_type命令标识一组预选组件，这些组件代表应用程序的常见用例。例如，“开发人员”安装类型可能包括一个应用程序以及其头文件和库文件，而“最终用户”安装类型可能仅包括该应用程序的可执行文件。每个组件通过cpack_add_component的INSTALL_TYPES参数以一种或多种安装类型标识自己。

trans-unit.source: The cpack_configure_downloads command configures installation-time downloads of selected components. For each downloadable component, CPack will create an archive containing the contents of that component, which should be uploaded to the given site. When the user selects that component for installation, the installer will download and extract the component in place. This feature is useful for creating small installers that only download the requested components, saving bandwidth. Additionally, the installers are small enough that they will be installed as part of the normal installation process, and the “Change” button in Windows Add/Remove Programs control panel will allow one to add or remove parts of the application after the original installation. On Windows, the downloaded-components functionality requires the ZipDLL plug-in for NSIS, available at:
trans-unit.target: cpack_configure_downloads命令配置所选组件的安装时下载。对于每个可下载的组件，CPack将创建一个包含该组件内容的存档，应将该存档上载到给定站点。当用户选择该组件进行安装时，安装程​​序将下载并解压缩该组件。此功能对于创建仅下载所需组件的小型安装程序很有用，从而节省了带宽。此外，安装程序非常小，可以在常规安装过程中进行安装，并且在Windows“添加/删除程序”控制面板中的“更改”按钮将允许您在原始安装后添加或删除应用程序的某些部分。在Windows上，下载组件功能需要NSIS的ZipDLL插件，可在：

trans-unit.source: The cproject file defines the CDT specific information. Some third party IDE’s are based on Eclipse with the addition of other information specific to that IDE. Through this property, it is possible to add this additional contents to the generated project. It is expected to contain valid XML.
trans-unit.target: cproject文件定义CDT特定的信息。某些第三方IDE基于Eclipse，并添加了特定于该IDE的其他信息。通过此属性，可以将此附加内容添加到生成的项目中。它应包含有效的XML。

trans-unit.source: The cuLIBOS library is a backend thread abstraction layer library which is static only. The CUDA::cublas_static, CUDA::cusparse_static, CUDA::cufft_static, CUDA::curand_static, and (when implemented) NPP libraries all automatically have this dependency linked.
trans-unit.target: cuLIBOS库是仅静态的后端线程抽象层库。在 CUDA::cublas_static ， CUDA::cusparse_static ， CUDA::cufft_static ， CUDA::curand_static ，和（执行时）NPP库中的所有已经自动这种依赖性链接。

trans-unit.source: The current settings of CMP0065 and CMP0083 are propagated through to the generated test project.
trans-unit.target: CMP0065 和 CMP0083 的当前设置将传播到生成的测试项目中。

trans-unit.source: The current stack of listfiles being processed.
trans-unit.target: 当前正在处理的列表文件的堆栈。

trans-unit.source: The current system’s CMake platform id. See also the CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME variable.
trans-unit.target: 当前系统的CMake平台ID。另请参阅 CMAKE_SYSTEM_NAME 变量。

trans-unit.source: The currently scheduled list of deferred calls may be retrieved:
trans-unit.target: 可检索当前已排定的推迟呼叫列表。

trans-unit.source: The custom <origin>_autogen target starts a number of threads of which each one parses a source file and on demand starts a moc or uic process. AUTOGEN_PARALLEL controls how many parallel threads (and therefore moc or uic processes) are started.
trans-unit.target: 定制的 <origin>_autogen 目标启动了多个线程，每个线程都解析一个源文件，并根据需要启动 moc 或 uic 进程。 AUTOGEN_PARALLEL 控制启动了多少个并行线程（并因此启动了 moc 或 uic 进程）。

trans-unit.source: The custom <origin>_autogen target starts a number of threads of which each one parses a source file and on demand starts a moc or uic process. AUTOGEN_PARALLEL controls how many parallel threads (and therefore moc or uic processes) are started.
trans-unit.target: 定制的 <origin>_autogen 目标启动了多个线程，每个线程都解析一个源文件，并根据需要启动了 moc 或 uic 进程。 AUTOGEN_PARALLEL 控制启动了多少个并行线程（并因此启动了 moc 或 uic 进程）。

trans-unit.source: The custom fetch script is expected to store fetched content in the file or set a variable:
trans-unit.target: 自定义获取脚本要将获取的内容存储在文件中或设置一个变量。

trans-unit.source: The custom step could then be triggered from the main build like so:
trans-unit.target: 然后,自定义步骤可以像这样从主构建中触发。

trans-unit.source: The debug object supports the “showStats” key, which takes a boolean and makes the server mode return a “zzzDebug” object with stats as part of its response. “dumpToFile” takes a string value and will cause the cmake server to copy the response into the given filename.
trans-unit.target: 调试对象支持“ showStats”键，该键采用布尔值，并使服务器模式返回带有统计信息的“ zzzDebug”对象，作为其响应的一部分。“ dumpToFile”采用字符串值，并将导致cmake服务器将响应复制到给定的文件名中。

trans-unit.source: The default OUTPUT_DIR can also be changed by setting the variable CMAKE_JAVA_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR.
trans-unit.target: 也可以通过设置变量 CMAKE_JAVA_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR 来更改默认的 OUTPUT_DIR 。

trans-unit.source: The default behavior or when the property is OFF is to generate a project file for the target and then a sub-project file for each source group.
trans-unit.target: 默认行为或该属性为 OFF 时的默认行为是为目标生成一个项目文件，然后为每个源组生成一个子项目文件。

trans-unit.source: The default build configuration for Build a Project and ctest build handler when there is no explicit configuration given.
trans-unit.target: 没有给出明确的配置时，用于构建项目和 ctest 构建处理程序的默认构建配置。

trans-unit.source: The default configuration of the Cray Programming Environment is to only support static libraries. This can be overridden and shared libraries enabled by setting the CRAYPE_LINK_TYPE environment variable to dynamic.
trans-unit.target: Cray编程环境的默认配置是仅支持静态库。这可以重写并且由设置启用共享库 CRAYPE_LINK_TYPE 环境变量来 dynamic 。

trans-unit.source: The default configure command runs CMake with options based on the main project. For non-CMake external projects, the CONFIGURE_COMMAND option must be used to override this behavior (generator expressions are supported). For projects that require no configure step, specify this option with an empty string as the command to execute.
trans-unit.target: 默认的configure命令使用基于主项目的选项运行CMake。对于非CMake外部项目，必须使用 CONFIGURE_COMMAND 选项覆盖此行为（支持 generator expressions ）。对于不需要配置步骤的项目，请使用空字符串将此选项指定为要执行的命令。

trans-unit.source: The default for either approach produces identical compilation flags, but if a project modifies CMAKE_SHARED_LIBRARY_<Lang>_FLAGS from its original value this policy determines which approach to use.
trans-unit.target: 两种方法的默认设置都会产生相同的编译标志，但是如果项目从其原始值修改了 CMAKE_SHARED_LIBRARY_<Lang>_FLAGS ，则此策略将确定要使用的方法。

trans-unit.source: The default order for sorting packages found using find_package(). It can assume one of the following values:
trans-unit.target: 使用 find_package() 找到的排序包的默认顺序。它可以采用以下值之一：

trans-unit.source: The default package types are , RUNTIME, OPTIONAL, RECOMMENDED and REQUIRED, and their importance is RUNTIME < OPTIONAL < RECOMMENDED < REQUIRED.
trans-unit.target: 默认的程序包类型为 RUNTIME ， OPTIONAL ， RECOMMENDED 和 REQUIRED ，其重要性为 RUNTIME < OPTIONAL < RECOMMENDED < REQUIRED 。

trans-unit.source: The default search order is designed to be most-specific to least-specific for common use cases. Projects may override the order by simply calling the command multiple times and using the NO_* options:
trans-unit.target: 对于常见的使用案例，默认搜索顺序被设计为最具体到最不具体。通过简单地多次调用命令并使用 NO_* 选项，项目可以覆盖顺序：

trans-unit.source: The default target used by Makefile and Ninja generators. Builds all targets in the buildsystem, except those which are excluded by their EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL target property or EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL directory property. The name ALL_BUILD is used for this purpose for the Xcode and Visual Studio generators.
trans-unit.target: Makefile 和 Ninja 生成器使用的默认目标。生成构建系统中的所有目标，但其 EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL 目标属性或 EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL 目录属性中未包含的目标除外。为此，将名称 ALL_BUILD 用于Xcode和Visual Studio生成器。

trans-unit.source: The default timeout for each test if not specified by the TIMEOUT test property.
trans-unit.target: 如果未由 TIMEOUT 测试属性指定，则每个测试的默认超时。

trans-unit.source: The default value for CMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS when there is no explicit configuration given on the first run while creating a new build tree. On later runs in an existing build tree the value persists in the cache as CMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS.
trans-unit.target: 在创建新的构建树时，在首次运行时未给出明确配置的情况下， CMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS 的默认值。以后在现有构建树中运行时，该值将以 CMAKE_EXPORT_COMPILE_COMMANDS 的形式保留在高速缓存中。

trans-unit.target: 此全局属性的默认值为 OPTIONAL 。

trans-unit.target: 此全局属性的默认值为 REQUIRED 。

trans-unit.target: 默认值为 OFF 。

trans-unit.target: 默认值为 Q_OBJECT;Q_GADGET;Q_NAMESPACE 。

trans-unit.source: The default value is bundle, framework, or app for the respective target types.
trans-unit.target: 对于相应的目标类型，默认值为 bundle ， framework 或 app 。

trans-unit.source: The default value is gnustl_static on NDK versions that provide it and otherwise c++_static. Note that this default differs from the native NDK build system because CMake may be used to build projects for Android that are not natively implemented for it and use the C++ standard library.
trans-unit.target: 默认值在提供该值的NDK版本上为 gnustl_static ，否则为 c++_static 。请注意，此默认设置与本机NDK生成系统有所不同，因为CMake可用于为Android生成本机未实现的项目，并使用C ++标准库。

trans-unit.source: The default value of this variable is computed by CPack and contains all components defined by the project. The user may set it to only include the specified components.
trans-unit.target: 这个变量的默认值由CPack计算,包含项目定义的所有组件。用户可以将其设置为只包含指定的组件。

trans-unit.source: The dependencies (list of components) on which this component depends.
trans-unit.target: 该组件所依赖的依赖关系(组件列表)。

trans-unit.source: The dependency contains any languages which produce side effects that are relevant to the library. Currently, all languages except C, C++, Objective-C, Objective-C++, assembly, and CUDA are assumed to produce side effects. However, side effects from one language are assumed not to be relevant to another (for example, a Fortran library is assumed to not have any side effects that are relevant for a Swift library.)
trans-unit.target: 该依赖关系包含了任何产生与库相关的副作用的语言。目前,除了C、C++、Objective-C、Objective-C++、汇编和CUDA之外的所有语言都被假定会产生副作用。然而,一种语言的副作用被假定为与另一种语言无关(例如,Fortran库被假定为没有任何与Swift库相关的副作用)。

trans-unit.source: The dependency contains any source files that were generated by a custom command.
trans-unit.target: 依赖关系包含任何由自定义命令生成的源文件。

trans-unit.source: The dependency has any PRE_BUILD, PRE_LINK, or POST_BUILD custom commands associated with it.
trans-unit.target: 依赖项具有与之关联的任何 PRE_BUILD ， PRE_LINK 或 POST_BUILD 自定义命令。

trans-unit.source: The dependency was added to the library by add_dependencies().
trans-unit.target: 依赖项通过 add_dependencies() 添加到库中。

trans-unit.source: The dependency was added to the library through a source file in the library generated by a custom command that uses the dependency.

trans-unit.source: The dependent DLL name is converted to lowercase. Windows DLL names are case-insensitive, and some linkers mangle the case of the DLL dependency names. However, this makes it more difficult for PRE_INCLUDE_REGEXES, PRE_EXCLUDE_REGEXES, POST_INCLUDE_REGEXES, and POST_EXCLUDE_REGEXES to properly filter DLL names - every regex would have to check for both uppercase and lowercase letters. For example:
trans-unit.target: 依赖的DLL名称将转换为小写。Windows DLL名称不区分大小写，并且某些链接器会破坏DLL依赖项名称的大小写。但是，这会使 PRE_INCLUDE_REGEXES ， PRE_EXCLUDE_REGEXES ， POST_INCLUDE_REGEXES 和 POST_EXCLUDE_REGEXES 正确过滤DLL名称更加困难-每个正则表达式都必须同时检查大写和小写字母。例如：

trans-unit.source: The different dependency types PUBLIC, PRIVATE and INTERFACE are represented as solid, dashed and dotted edges.
trans-unit.target: 不同的依赖关系类型 PUBLIC ， PRIVATE 和 INTERFACE 表示为实心，虚线和点线边缘。

trans-unit.source: The directories are added to the LINK_DIRECTORIES directory property for the current CMakeLists.txt file, converting relative paths to absolute as needed. The command will apply only to targets created after it is called.
trans-unit.target: 这些目录将添加到当前 CMakeLists.txt 文件的 LINK_DIRECTORIES 目录属性中，并根据需要将相对路径转换为绝对路径。该命令仅适用于调用后创建的目标。

trans-unit.target: PATH 和 INCLUDE 中的目录。

trans-unit.source: The directories in PATH itself.
trans-unit.target: PATH 本身中的目录。

trans-unit.source: The directory <dir> is relative to the installation prefix, which is stored in the variable CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX.
trans-unit.target: 目录 <dir> 相对于安装前缀，该前缀存储在变量 CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX 中。

trans-unit.source: The directory containing gdal.h.
trans-unit.target: 包含 gdal.h 的目录。

trans-unit.source: The directory containing the XCTest Framework headers.
trans-unit.target: 包含XCTest框架头文件的目录。

trans-unit.source: The directory containing the iconv headers.
trans-unit.target: 包含iconv头文件的目录。

trans-unit.source: The directory from which the test executable will be called.
trans-unit.target: 调用测试可执行文件的目录。

trans-unit.source: The directory holding the backtrace(3) header.
trans-unit.target: 包含 backtrace(3) 标头的目录。

trans-unit.source: The directory in which CPack is doing its packaging. If it is not set then this will default (internally) to the build dir. This variable may be defined in a CPack config file or from the cpack command line option -B. If set, the command line option overrides the value found in the config file.
trans-unit.target: CPack正在打包的目录。如果未设置，则默认为（内部）构建目录。可以在CPack配置文件中或从 cpack 命令行选项 -B 中定义此变量。如果设置，则命令行选项将覆盖在配置文件中找到的值。

trans-unit.source: The directory is created on demand and automatically added to the ADDITIONAL_CLEAN_FILES target property.
trans-unit.target: 该目录是根据需要创建的，并自动添加到 ADDITIONAL_CLEAN_FILES 目标属性。

trans-unit.source: The directory property is used to initialize the LINK_DIRECTORIES target property when a target is created. That target property is used by the generators to set the library search directories for the linker.
trans-unit.target: 创建目标时，目录属性用于初始化 LINK_DIRECTORIES 目标属性。生成器使用该target属性来设置链接器的库搜索目录。

trans-unit.source: The directory specified here must be such that the executable nvcc or the appropriate version.txt file can be found underneath the specified directory.
trans-unit.target: 此处指定的目录必须能够在指定目录下找到可执行文件 nvcc 或相应的 version.txt 文件。

trans-unit.source: The directory where the class files can be found. For example to use them with javah.
trans-unit.target: 可以在其中找到类文件的目录。例如，将它们与 javah 一起使用。

trans-unit.source: The directory where the content of the archive will be extracted to can be specified using the DESTINATION option. If the directory does not exist, it will be created. If DESTINATION is not given, the current binary directory will be used.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 DESTINATION 选项指定将存档内容提取到的目录。如果目录不存在，将创建该目录。如果未给出 DESTINATION ，则将使用当前的二进制目录。

trans-unit.source: The directory with the CMakeCache.txt file.
trans-unit.target: 带有 CMakeCache.txt 文件的目录。

trans-unit.source: The end result is that MathFunctions/CMakeLists.txt should look like:
trans-unit.target: 最终结果是 MathFunctions/CMakeLists.txt 看起来应该像这样：

trans-unit.source: The environment variable CTEST_PARALLEL_LEVEL can alternatively be set to avoid the need to pass -j.
trans-unit.target: 可以选择设置环境变量 CTEST_PARALLEL_LEVEL 以避免传递 -j 。

trans-unit.source: The environment variable CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH may also be populated with prefixes to search for packages. Like the PATH environment variable, this is a list and needs to use the platform-specific environment variable list item separator (: on Unix and ; on Windows).
trans-unit.target: 环境变量 CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH 也可以用前缀填充以搜索软件包。与 PATH 环境变量一样，这是一个列表，需要使用特定于平台的环境变量列表项分隔符（在Unix上为 : ，在Windows上为 ; ）。

trans-unit.source: The environment variable ICE_HOME may also be used; the Ice_HOME variable takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 也可以使用环境变量 ICE_HOME 。Ice_HOME变量优先。

trans-unit.source: The environment variable ICU_ROOT may also be used; the ICU_ROOT variable takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 也可以使用环境变量 ICU_ROOT 。ICU_ROOT变量优先。

trans-unit.source: The exact compile flags and language standard are deliberately not part of the user interface for this use-case. CMake will compute the appropriate compile flags to use by considering the features specified for each target.
trans-unit.target: 确切的编译标志和语言标准在这种情况下故意不作为用户界面的一部分。CMake 将通过考虑为每个目标指定的特性来计算适当的编译标志。

trans-unit.source: The exact parsing rules depend on the operating system. They are specified by the <mode> argument which must be one of the following keywords:
trans-unit.target: 确切的解析规则取决于操作系统。它们由 <mode> 参数指定，该参数必须是下列关键字之一：

trans-unit.source: The exact version of the CUDA Toolkit found (as reported by nvcc --version or version.txt).
trans-unit.target: 找到的CUDA工具包的确切版本（由 nvcc --version 或 version.txt 报告）。

trans-unit.source: The executable file (e.g. .exe) of an executable target created by the add_executable() command.
trans-unit.target: 由 add_executable() 命令创建的可执行目标的可执行文件（例如 .exe ）。

trans-unit.source: The executable is run in the optionally specified directory. The executable can include arguments if it is double quoted, but it is better to use the optional ARGS argument to specify arguments to the program. This is because cmake will then be able to escape spaces in the executable path. An optional argument OUTPUT_VARIABLE specifies a variable in which to store the output. To capture the return value of the execution, provide a RETURN_VALUE. If OUTPUT_VARIABLE is specified, then no output will go to the stdout/stderr of the console running cmake.
trans-unit.target: 可执行文件在可选的指定目录中运行。如果可执行文件被双引号引起来，则可以包含参数，但是最好使用可选的 ARGS 参数来指定程序的参数。这是因为cmake随后将能够转义可执行路径中的空格。可选参数 OUTPUT_VARIABLE 指定用于存储输出的变量。要捕获执行的返回值，请提供 RETURN_VALUE 。如果指定了 OUTPUT_VARIABLE ，则没有输出将输出到运行cmake的控制台的stdout / stderr。

trans-unit.source: The existence of FindQt means that for Qt upstream to provide package config files that can be found by find_package(Qt), the consuming project has to explicitly specify find_package(Qt CONFIG). Removing this module gives Qt a path forward for exporting its own config files which can easily be found by consuming projects.
trans-unit.target: FindQt 的存在意味着Qt上游要提供可以通过 find_package(Qt) 找到的程序包配置文件，使用方项目必须显式指定 find_package(Qt CONFIG) 。删除此模块为Qt提供了导出自己的配置文件的前进路径，可以通过使用项目轻松找到它。

trans-unit.source: The external library providing backtrace, if any.
trans-unit.target: 如果有的话,提供回溯的外部库。

trans-unit.source: The external project’s own install step is invoked as part of the main project’s build. It is done after the external project’s build step and may be before or after the external project’s test step (see the TEST_BEFORE_INSTALL option below). The external project’s install rules are not part of the main project’s install rules, so if anything from the external project should be installed as part of the main build, these need to be specified in the main build as additional install() commands. The default install step builds the install target of the external project, but this can be overridden with a custom command using this option (generator expressions are supported). Passing an empty string as the <cmd> makes the install step do nothing.
trans-unit.target: 外部项目自己的安装步骤将作为主项目build的一部分被调用。它是在外部项目的构建步骤之后完成的，并且可以在外部项目的测试步骤之前或之后进行（请参阅下面的 TEST_BEFORE_INSTALL 选项）。外部项目的安装规则不属于主项目的安装规则，因此，如果外部项目中的任何内容都应作为主构建的一部分进行安装，则需要在主构建中将这些内容指定为附加的 install() 命令。默认安装步骤将构建外部项目的 install 目标，但是可以使用此选项使用定制命令来覆盖此目标（支持 generator expressions ）。传递一个空字符串作为 <cmd> 使安装步骤不执行任何操作。

trans-unit.source: The external toolchain for cross-compiling, if supported.
trans-unit.target: 如果支持的话,用于交叉编译的外部工具链。

trans-unit.source: The extra generator used to build the project. See cmake-generators(7).
trans-unit.target: 用于构建项目的额外生成器。参见 cmake-generators(7) 。

trans-unit.source: The fatal error is emitted before the installation of the offending file takes place. Some CPack generators, like NSIS, enforce this internally. This variable triggers the definition of CMAKE_ERROR_ON_ABSOLUTE_INSTALL_DESTINATION when CPack runs.
trans-unit.target: 在安装有问题的文件之前会发出致命错误。一些CPack生成器（例如 NSIS ）在内部强制执行此操作。当CPack运行时，此变量触发 CMAKE_ERROR_ON_ABSOLUTE_INSTALL_DESTINATION 的定义。

trans-unit.source: The fatal error is emitted before the installation of the offending file takes place. This variable is used by CMake-generated cmake_install.cmake scripts. If one sets this variable to ON while running the script, it may get fatal error messages from the script.
trans-unit.target: 在安装有问题的文件之前会发出致命错误。CMake生成的 cmake_install.cmake 脚本使用此变量。如果在运行脚本时将此变量设置为 ON ，则可能会从脚本中收到致命错误消息。

trans-unit.source: The features and user interfaces described in this manual are available for all CMake-based build systems by virtue of providing CMake files.
trans-unit.target: 本手册中描述的功能和用户界面由于提供了CMake文件,所以对所有基于CMake的构建系统都是可用的。

trans-unit.source: The features known to this version of CMake are listed below.
trans-unit.target: 这个版本的CMake已知的功能如下。

trans-unit.source: The features known to this version of CMake are:
trans-unit.target: 这个版本的CMake已知的功能有:。

trans-unit.source: The features listed here may be used with the target_compile_features() command. See the cmake-compile-features(7) manual for information on compile features and a list of supported compilers.
trans-unit.target: 此处列出的功能可以与 target_compile_features() 命令一起使用。有关 cmake-compile-features(7) 的信息和支持的编译器列表，请参见cmake-compile-features（7）手册。

trans-unit.source: The features listed in this global property may be known to be available to the C compiler. If the feature is available with the C compiler, it will be listed in the CMAKE_C_COMPILE_FEATURES variable.
trans-unit.target: 已知此全局属性中列出的功能可用于C编译器。如果该功能可用于C编译器，它将在 CMAKE_C_COMPILE_FEATURES 变量中列出。

trans-unit.source: The features listed in this global property may be known to be available to the C++ compiler. If the feature is available with the C++ compiler, it will be listed in the CMAKE_CXX_COMPILE_FEATURES variable.
trans-unit.target: 众所周知，此全局属性中列出的功能可用于C ++编译器。如果该功能可用于C ++编译器，它将列在 CMAKE_CXX_COMPILE_FEATURES 变量中。

trans-unit.source: The features listed in this global property may be known to be available to the CUDA compiler. If the feature is available with the C++ compiler, it will be listed in the CMAKE_CUDA_COMPILE_FEATURES variable.
trans-unit.target: 众所周知，此全局属性中列出的功能可用于CUDA编译器。如果该功能可用于C ++编译器，它将在 CMAKE_CUDA_COMPILE_FEATURES 变量中列出。

trans-unit.source: The file created by this command is specific to the build tree and should never be installed. See the install(EXPORT) command to export targets from an installation tree.
trans-unit.target: 该命令创建的文件是特定于构建树的，永远不要安装。请参阅 install(EXPORT) 命令以从安装树中导出目标。

trans-unit.source: The file extension is built into the name of the target because another file with the same name but a different extension may exist. However, build-targets without the file extension are also provided.
trans-unit.target: 文件扩展名是建立在目标名称中的,因为可能存在另一个相同名称但不同扩展名的文件。但是,也提供没有文件扩展名的构建目标。

trans-unit.source: The file extension used to name a BUNDLE, a FRAMEWORK, or a MACOSX_BUNDLE target on the macOS and iOS.
trans-unit.target: 文件扩展名，用于在macOS和iOS上命名 BUNDLE ， FRAMEWORK 或 MACOSX_BUNDLE 目标。

trans-unit.source: The file name found in the first match group is searched for
trans-unit.target: 在第一个匹配组中找到的文件名会被搜索到

trans-unit.source: The file named will be attached to the standard input of the first process, standard output of the last process, or standard error of all processes, respectively. If the same file is named for both output and error then it will be used for both.
trans-unit.target: 被命名的文件将分别附加到第一个进程的标准输入、最后一个进程的标准输出或所有进程的标准错误。如果输出和错误都用同一个文件命名,那么这两个文件将同时使用。

trans-unit.source: The file-based API uses a <build>/.cmake/api/ directory at the top of a build tree. The API is versioned to support changes to the layout of files within the API directory. API file layout versioning is orthogonal to the versioning of Object Kinds used in replies. This version of CMake supports only one API version, API v1.
trans-unit.target: 基于文件的API 在构建树的顶部使用 <build>/.cmake/api/ 目录。对API进行了版本控制，以支持对API目录中文件布局的更改。API文件布局版本控制与答复中使用的对象类型的版本控制正交。此版本的CMake仅支持一个API版本API v1。

trans-unit.source: The files are a JSON document with an object as the root:
trans-unit.target: 文件是一个以对象为根的JSON文档。

trans-unit.source: The files which should be installed. This is used by install_jar().
trans-unit.target: 应该安装的文件。这由 install_jar() 使用。

trans-unit.source: The final \ on any line ending in an odd number of backslashes is treated as a line continuation and ignored along with the immediately following newline character. For example:
trans-unit.target: 在以奇数个反斜杠结尾的任何行上的最后一个 \ 将被视为行的延续，并与紧随其后的换行符一起被忽略。例如：

trans-unit.source: The final set of compile or link options used for a target is constructed by accumulating options from the current target and the usage requirements of it dependencies. The set of options is de-duplicated to avoid repetition. While beneficial for individual options, the de-duplication step can break up option groups. For example, -D A -D B becomes -D A B. One may specify a group of options using shell-like quoting along with a SHELL: prefix. The SHELL: prefix is dropped and the rest of the option string is parsed using the separate_arguments()UNIX_COMMAND mode. For example, "SHELL:-D A" "SHELL:-D B" becomes -D A -D B.
trans-unit.target: 用于目标的最终一组编译或链接选项是通过累积来自当前目标的选项及其依赖项的使用要求而构建的。选项集将被重复删除，以避免重复。重复数据删除步骤虽然有益于单个选项，但可以拆分选项组。例如， -D A -D B 变为 -D A B 。可以使用类似shell的引号和 SHELL: 前缀来指定一组选项。该 SHELL: 前缀被丢弃，选项字符串的其余部分使用解析 separate_arguments() UNIX_COMMAND 模式。例如， "SHELL:-D A" "SHELL:-D B" -D A -D B ”“ SHELL：-DB ”变为-DA -DB。

trans-unit.source: The final set of compile or link options used for a target is constructed by accumulating options from the current target and the usage requirements of its dependencies. The set of options is de-duplicated to avoid repetition. While beneficial for individual options, the de-duplication step can break up option groups. For example, -D A -D B becomes -D A B. One may specify a group of options using shell-like quoting along with a SHELL: prefix. The SHELL: prefix is dropped, and the rest of the option string is parsed using the separate_arguments()UNIX_COMMAND mode. For example, "SHELL:-D A" "SHELL:-D B" becomes -D A -D B.
trans-unit.target: 通过累积来自当前目标的选项及其依赖项的使用要求，构建用于目标的最终编译或链接选项集。选项集将被重复删除，以避免重复。重复数据删除步骤虽然有益于单个选项，但可以拆分选项组。例如， -D A -D B 变为 -D A B 。可以使用类似shell的引号和 SHELL: 前缀来指定一组选项。将删除 SHELL: 前缀，并使用 UNIX_COMMAND separate_arguments() UNIX_COMMAND模式解析其余的选项字符串。例如， "SHELL:-D A" "SHELL:-D B" -D A -D B ”“ SHELL：-DB ”变为-DA -DB。

trans-unit.source: The final set of include directories listed in one variable for use by client code. This should not be a cache entry.
trans-unit.target: 在一个变量中列出的最后一组包含目录,供客户端代码使用。这不应该是一个缓存条目。

trans-unit.source: The find module implementation may begin below the documentation block. Now the actual libraries and so on have to be found. The code here will obviously vary from module to module (dealing with that, after all, is the point of find modules), but there tends to be a common pattern for libraries.
trans-unit.target: 查找模块的实现可以从文档块下面开始。现在必须找到实际的库等。这里的代码显然会因模块而异(毕竟处理这些问题是find模块的重点),但是对于库来说,往往有一个共同的模式。

trans-unit.source: The first argument (TEST_VARIABLE) is the name of the variable to be tested, if that variable is false nothing else is done. If TEST_VARIABLE is true, then the next argument (RESULT_VARIABLE) is a variable that is set to true if all the required variables are set. The rest of the arguments are variables that must be true or not set to NOTFOUND to avoid an error. If any are not true, an error is reported.
trans-unit.target: 第一个参数（ TEST_VARIABLE ）是要测试的变量的名称，如果该变量为false，则不执行其他任何操作。如果 TEST_VARIABLE 为true，则下一个参数（ RESULT_VARIABLE ）是一个变量，如果设置了所有必需的变量，则将其设置为true。其余参数是必须为true或不设置为 NOTFOUND 以避免错误的变量。如果不正确，则报告错误。

trans-unit.source: The first argument determines the scope in which the property is set. It must be one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 第一个参数决定设置属性的范围。它必须是下列之一:

trans-unit.source: The first argument is the file name, the rest of the arguments are messages to write. If the argument APPEND is specified, then the message will be appended.
trans-unit.target: 第一个参数是文件名，其余参数是要写入的消息。如果指定了参数 APPEND ，则将附加该消息。

trans-unit.source: The first argument specifies the variable in which to store the result. The second argument determines the scope from which to get the property. It must be one of the following:

trans-unit.source: The function constructs a Doxyfile and defines a custom target that runs Doxygen on that generated file. The listed files and directories are used as the INPUT of the generated Doxyfile and they can contain wildcards. Any files that are listed explicitly will also be added as SOURCES of the custom target so they will show up in an IDE project’s source list.
trans-unit.target: 该函数构造一个 Doxyfile ,并定义一个在生成的文件上运行Doxygen的自定义目标。列出的文件和目录用作生成的 Doxyfile 的 INPUT ，它们可以包含通配符。明确列出的所有文件也将作为自定义目标的 SOURCES 添加，因此它们将显示在IDE项目的源列表中。

trans-unit.source: The function expects one Matlab test script file to be given. In the case NO_UNITTEST_FRAMEWORK is given, the unittest script file should contain the script to be run, plus an exit command with the exit value. This exit value will be passed to the ctest framework (0 success, non 0 failure). Additional arguments accepted by add_test() can be passed through TEST_ARGS (eg. CONFIGURATION <config> ...).
trans-unit.target: 该函数希望提供一个Matlab测试脚本文件。如果给出了 NO_UNITTEST_FRAMEWORK ，则unittest脚本文件应包含要运行的脚本，以及带有退出值的退出命令。该退出值将传递给ctest框架（0成功，非0错误）。 add_test() 接受的其他参数可以通过 TEST_ARGS 传递（例如 CONFIGURATION <config> ... ）。

trans-unit.source: The generated IMPORTED targets have appropriate properties set to define their usage requirements, such as INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES, INTERFACE_COMPILE_DEFINITIONS and other relevant built-in INTERFACE_ properties. The INTERFACE variant of user-defined properties listed in COMPATIBLE_INTERFACE_STRING and other Compatible Interface Properties are also propagated to the generated IMPORTED targets. In the above case, ClimbingStats_MAJOR_VERSION is defined as a string which must be compatible among the dependencies of any depender. By setting this custom defined user property in this version and in the next version of ClimbingStats, cmake(1) will issue a diagnostic if there is an attempt to use version 3 together with version 4. Packages can choose to employ such a pattern if different major versions of the package are designed to be incompatible.
trans-unit.target: 生成的 IMPORTED 目标设置了适当的属性来定义其使用要求，例如 INTERFACE_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES ， INTERFACE_COMPILE_DEFINITIONS 和其他相关的内置 INTERFACE_ 属性。在 COMPATIBLE_INTERFACE_STRING 中列出的用户定义属性的 INTERFACE 变体和其他兼容接口属性也将传播到生成的 IMPORTED 目标。在上述情况下， ClimbingStats_MAJOR_VERSION 被定义为必须在任何依赖项的依赖项之间兼容的字符串。通过在此版本和下一版本的 ClimbingStats 中设置此自定义的用户属性，如果尝试将版本3与版本4一起使用，则 cmake(1) 将发出诊断信息。如果不同，程序包可以选择采用这种模式。该软件包的主要版本设计为不兼容。

trans-unit.source: The generated binary installers will contain all files that have been installed via CMake’s install() command (and the deprecated commands install_files(), install_programs(), and install_targets()). Note that the DESTINATION option of the install() command must be a relative path; otherwise installed files are ignored by CPack.
trans-unit.target: 生成的二进制安装程序将包含通过CMake的 install() 命令（以及已弃用的命令 install_files() ， install_programs() 和 install_targets() ）安装的所有文件。注意， install() 命令的 DESTINATION 选项必须是相对路径。否则，CPack将忽略已安装的文件。

trans-unit.source: The generated build system will link myexe to m.lib when built in the release configuration, and md.lib when built in the debug configuration.
trans-unit.target: 产生的构建系统将连接 myexe 到 m.lib 建在发布配置时，和 md.lib 建在调试配置的时候。

trans-unit.source: The generators for Visual Studio 10 2010 and above set this variable to the MSBuild.exe command installed with the corresponding Visual Studio version.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 10 2010 及更高版本的生成器将此变量设置为随相应Visual Studio版本安装的 MSBuild.exe 命令。

trans-unit.source: The generators for Visual Studio 9 2008 and above set this variable to the devenv.com command installed with the corresponding Visual Studio version. Note that this variable may be empty on Visual Studio Express editions because they do not provide this tool.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 9 2008 及更高版本的生成器将此变量设置为随相应Visual Studio版本安装的 devenv.com 命令。请注意，此变量在Visual Studio Express版本上可能为空，因为它们不提供此工具。

trans-unit.source: The given directory must be known to CMake, being either the top-level directory or one added by add_subdirectory(). Furthermore, the given directory must not yet be finished processing. This means it can be the current directory or one of its ancestors.
trans-unit.target: CMake必须知道给定目录，它是顶层目录，也可以是 add_subdirectory() 添加的目录。此外，给定目录必须尚未完成处理。这意味着它可以是当前目录或它的祖先之一。

trans-unit.source: The given locations are searched for a library whose name is cmCOMMAND_NAME. If found, it is loaded as a module and the command is added to the set of available CMake commands. Usually, try_compile() is used before this command to compile the module. If the command is successfully loaded a variable named
trans-unit.target: 在给定的位置搜索名称为cmCOMMAND_NAME的库。如果找到，它将作为模块加载，并将命令添加到可用的CMake命令集中。通常，在此命令之前使用 try_compile() 来编译模块。如果命令成功加载，则名为

trans-unit.source: The given test command is expected to exit with code 0 to pass and non-zero to fail, or vice-versa if the WILL_FAIL test property is set. Any output written to stdout or stderr will be captured by ctest(1) but does not affect the pass/fail status unless the PASS_REGULAR_EXPRESSION or FAIL_REGULAR_EXPRESSION test property is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 WILL_FAIL 测试属性，则预期给定的测试命令将以代码 0 退出并通过而不为零退出，否则将失败，反之亦然。除非使用 PASS_REGULAR_EXPRESSION 或 FAIL_REGULAR_EXPRESSION 测试属性，否则所有写入stdout或stderr的输出都将被 ctest(1) 捕获，但不会影响通过/失败状态。

trans-unit.source: The given test command is expected to exit with code 0 to pass and non-zero to fail, or vice-versa if the WILL_FAIL test property is set. Any output written to stdout or stderr will be captured by ctest(1) but does not affect the pass/fail status unless the PASS_REGULAR_EXPRESSION, FAIL_REGULAR_EXPRESSION or SKIP_REGULAR_EXPRESSION test property is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 WILL_FAIL 测试属性，则预期给定的测试命令将以代码 0 退出并通过，非零退出以失败，反之亦然。除非使用 PASS_REGULAR_EXPRESSION ， FAIL_REGULAR_EXPRESSION 或 SKIP_REGULAR_EXPRESSION 测试属性，否则所有写入stdout或stderr的输出都将被 ctest(1) 捕获，但不会影响通过/失败状态。

trans-unit.source: The global property FeatureSummary_<TYPE>_DESCRIPTION can be defined for each type to replace the type name with the specified string whenever the package type is used in an output string.
trans-unit.target: 可以为每种类型定义全局属性 FeatureSummary_<TYPE>_DESCRIPTION ,以便在输出字符串中使用包类型时，用指定的字符串替换类型名称。

trans-unit.source: The global property FeatureSummary_DEFAULT_PKG_TYPE defines which package type is the default one. When calling feature_summary(), if the user did not set the package type explicitly, the package will be assigned to this category.
trans-unit.target: 全局属性 FeatureSummary_DEFAULT_PKG_TYPE 定义哪种程序包类型是默认程序包类型。调用 feature_summary() 时，如果用户未明确设置包类型，则将包分配给该类别。

trans-unit.source: The global property FeatureSummary_PKG_TYPES defines the type of packages used by FeatureSummary.
trans-unit.target: 全局属性 FeatureSummary_PKG_TYPES 定义 FeatureSummary 使用的包的类型。

trans-unit.source: The global property FeatureSummary_REQUIRED_PKG_TYPES defines which package types are required.
trans-unit.target: 全局属性 FeatureSummary_REQUIRED_PKG_TYPES 定义所需的包类型。

trans-unit.source: The if command was written very early in CMake’s history, predating the ${} variable evaluation syntax, and for convenience evaluates variables named by its arguments as shown in the above signatures. Note that normal variable evaluation with ${} applies before the if command even receives the arguments. Therefore code like
trans-unit.target: if命令是在CMake的历史中很早就编写的，它早于 ${} 变量评估语法，并且为了方便起见，评估了由其参数命名的变量，如上面的签名所示。请注意，在if命令甚至接收到参数之前，使用 ${} 普通变量评估。因此代码像

trans-unit.source: The implementation of this command has been empty since December 2001 but was kept in CMake for compatibility for a long time.
trans-unit.target: 这个命令的实现自2001年12月以来一直是空的,但为了兼容性,在CMake中保留了很长一段时间。

trans-unit.source: The implementation was buggy and always returned 0. It cannot be fixed without breaking backwards compatibility. Use rm instead.
trans-unit.target: 该实现有错误，始终返回0。在不破坏向后兼容性的情况下就无法修复该实现。使用 rm 代替。

trans-unit.source: The include directories are added to the INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES directory property for the current CMakeLists file. They are also added to the INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES target property for each target in the current CMakeLists file. The target property values are the ones used by the generators.
trans-unit.target: 包含目录将添加到当前 CMakeLists 文件的 INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 目录属性中。它们也被添加到当前 CMakeLists 文件中每个目标的 INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 目标属性中。目标属性值是生成器使用的属性值。

trans-unit.source: The include directories needed to use backtrace(3) header.
trans-unit.target: 使用 backtrace(3) 标头所需的包含目录。

trans-unit.source: The include directories needed to use Curses.
trans-unit.target: 使用Curses所需的包含目录。

trans-unit.source: The include directory for exslt.
trans-unit.target: exslt的include目录。

trans-unit.source: The include directory for protocol buffers
trans-unit.target: 协议缓冲区的包含目录

trans-unit.source: The include directory is automatically added to the target’s INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES.
trans-unit.target: include目录将自动添加到目标的 INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES 。

trans-unit.source: The include guard applies globally to the whole build. The current file will only be included once regardless of the scope.
trans-unit.target: include guard适用于全局的构建。当前文件只会被包含一次,而不考虑范围。

trans-unit.source: The include guard applies within the current directory and below. The file will only be included once within this directory scope, but may be included again by other files outside of this directory (i.e. a parent directory or another directory not pulled in by add_subdirectory() or include() from the current file or its children).
trans-unit.target: 包含保护适用于当前目录及以下目录。该文件只会在此目录范围内包含一次，但可能会被该目录之外的其他文件再次包含（即，父目录或其他目录未从当前文件或其子级的 add_subdirectory() 或 include() 引入））。

trans-unit.source: The individual steps within the process can be driven independently if required (e.g. for CDash submission) and extra custom steps can be defined, along with the ability to control the step dependencies. The directory structure used for the management of the external project can also be customized. The function supports a large number of options which can be used to tailor the external project behavior.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要,流程中的各个步骤可以独立驱动(例如CDash提交),还可以定义额外的自定义步骤,以及控制步骤依赖性的能力。也可以自定义用于管理外部项目的目录结构。该功能支持大量的选项,可用于定制外部项目行为。

trans-unit.source: The initial message send by the cmake server on startup is of type “hello”. This is the only message ever sent by the server that is not of type “reply”, “progress” or “error”.
trans-unit.target: cmake服务器在启动时发送的初始消息的类型为“ hello”。这是服务器发送的唯一消息，不是“ reply”，“ progress”或“ error”类型。

trans-unit.source: The initial value for this property is taken from the CMAKE_UNITY_BUILD_BATCH_SIZE variable when the target is created. If that variable has not been set, the initial value will be 8.
trans-unit.target: 创建目标时，此属性的初始值来自 CMAKE_UNITY_BUILD_BATCH_SIZE 变量。如果尚未设置该变量，则初始值为8。

trans-unit.source: The input source file, an alias for <YaccInput>
trans-unit.target: 输入源文件，<YaccInput>的别名

trans-unit.source: The install rules are fairly simple: for MathFunctions we want to install the library and header file and for the application we want to install the executable and configured header.
trans-unit.target: 安装规则相当简单:对于MathFunctions,我们要安装库和头文件,对于应用程序,我们要安装可执行文件和配置的头文件。

trans-unit.source: The installation prefix is also added to CMAKE_SYSTEM_PREFIX_PATH so that find_package(), find_program(), find_library(), find_path(), and find_file() will search the prefix for other software.
trans-unit.target: 安装前缀也会添加到 CMAKE_SYSTEM_PREFIX_PATH 中,以便 find_package() ， find_program() ， find_library() ， find_path() 和 find_file() 会在前缀中搜索其他软件。

trans-unit.source: The installed <export-name>.cmake file may come with additional per-configuration <export-name>-*.cmake files to be loaded by globbing. Do not use an export name that is the same as the package name in combination with installing a <package-name>-config.cmake file or the latter may be incorrectly matched by the glob and loaded.
trans-unit.target: 安装的 <export-name>.cmake 文件可能会附带其他按配置配置的 <export-name>-*.cmake 文件，以便通过全局方式加载。请勿将与软件包名称相同的导出名称与安装 <package-name>-config.cmake 文件一起使用，否则该glob可能会错误地匹配并加载后者。

trans-unit.source: The key of which the base will be computed. Expected to be a upper case full filename.
trans-unit.target: 计算基数的键。希望是大写的完整文件名。

trans-unit.source: The language of the source files compiled.
trans-unit.target: 编译的源文件的语言。

trans-unit.source: The last filename component of ${sourceDir}. For example, if ${sourceDir} is /path/to/source, this would be source.
trans-unit.target: ${sourceDir} 的最后一个文件名部分。例如，如果 ${sourceDir} 是 /path/to/source ，则它将是 source 。

trans-unit.source: The left and right hand arguments to AND and OR are independently tested to see if they are boolean constants, if so they are used as such, otherwise they are assumed to be variables and are dereferenced.
trans-unit.target: 对 AND 和 OR 的左右参数进行独立测试，以查看它们是否为布尔常量，如果是，则按原样使用它们，否则假定它们为变量并被取消引用。

trans-unit.source: The left hand argument to MATCHES is first checked to see if it is a defined variable, if so the variable’s value is used, otherwise the original value is used.
trans-unit.target: 首先检查 MATCHES 的左手参数，看它是否是定义的变量，如果是，则使用变量的值，否则使用原始值。

trans-unit.source: The library dependency graph is normally acyclic (a DAG), but in the case of mutually-dependent STATIC libraries CMake allows the graph to contain cycles (strongly connected components). When another target links to one of the libraries, CMake repeats the entire connected component. For example, the code
trans-unit.target: 库依赖图通常是非循环的（DAG），但是在相互依赖的 STATIC 库的情况下，CMake允许该图包含循环（强连接的组件）。当另一个目标链接到一个库时，CMake将重复整个连接的组件。例如，代码

trans-unit.source: The library name/flag is treated as a command-line string fragment and will be used with no extra quoting or escaping.
trans-unit.target: 库名/标志被视为一个命令行字符串片段,使用时不需要额外的引号或转义。

trans-unit.source: The library or executable may not be necessary in the primary deploy/debug scenario, and excluding from deployment saves time in the develop/download/debug cycle.
trans-unit.target: 在主要的部署/调试场景中,库或可执行文件可能并不是必需的,从部署中排除可以节省开发/下载/调试周期的时间。

trans-unit.source: The library variables below are set as normal variables. These contain debug/optimized keywords when a debugging library is found.
trans-unit.target: 下面的库变量被设置为普通变量。当找到调试库时,这些包含调试/优化的关键字。

trans-unit.source: The line in file of the function call.
trans-unit.target: 函数调用 file 中的行。

trans-unit.source: The line number of the current file being processed.
trans-unit.target: 当前正在处理的文件的行号。

trans-unit.source: The link (or archiving) step of those other targets will use the object files collection in addition to those from their own sources.
trans-unit.target: 那些其他目标的链接(或归档)步骤除了使用自己来源的对象文件集合外,还将使用这些对象文件。

trans-unit.source: The link (or archiving) step of those other targets will use the object files from OBJECT libraries that are directly linked. Additionally, usage requirements of the OBJECT libraries will be honored when compiling sources in those other targets. Furthermore, those usage requirements will propagate transitively to dependents of those other targets.
trans-unit.target: 其他目标的链接（或归档）步骤将使用直接链接的 OBJECT 库中的对象文件。此外，在其他目标中编译源代码时，将遵守 OBJECT 库的使用要求。此外，这些使用要求将传递给那些其他目标的依存者。

trans-unit.source: The link flag is treated as a command-line string fragment and will be used with no extra quoting or escaping.
trans-unit.target: 链接标志被视为命令行字符串片段,使用时不需要额外的引号或转义。

trans-unit.source: The link language of target when evaluating link options. See the related boolean expression$<LINK_LANGUAGE:language> for notes about the portability of this generator expression.
trans-unit.target: 评估链接选项时目标的链接语言。有关此生成器表达式的可移植性的说明，请参见相关的布尔表达式 $<LINK_LANGUAGE:language> 。

trans-unit.source: The linker-generated program database files are specified by the /pdb linker flag and are not the same as compiler-generated program database files specified by the /Fd compiler flag. Use the COMPILE_PDB_NAME property to specify the latter.
trans-unit.target: 链接器生成的程序数据库文件由 /pdb 链接器标志指定，并且与 /Fd 编译器标志指定的编译器生成的程序数据库文件不同。使用 COMPILE_PDB_NAME 属性指定后者。

trans-unit.source: The linker-generated program database files are specified by the /pdb linker flag and are not the same as compiler-generated program database files specified by the /Fd compiler flag. Use the COMPILE_PDB_NAME property to specify the latter.
trans-unit.target: 链接器生成的程序数据库文件由 /pdb 链接器标志指定，并且与 /Fd 编译器标志指定的编译器生成的程序数据库文件不同。使用 COMPILE_PDB_NAME 属性指定后者。

trans-unit.source: The linker-generated program database files are specified by the /pdb linker flag and are not the same as compiler-generated program database files specified by the /Fd compiler flag. Use the COMPILE_PDB_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY property to specify the latter.
trans-unit.target: 链接器生成的程序数据库文件由 /pdb 链接器标志指定，并且与 /Fd 编译器标志指定的编译器生成的程序数据库文件不同。使用 COMPILE_PDB_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY 属性指定后者。

trans-unit.source: The linker-generated program database files are specified by the /pdb linker flag and are not the same as compiler-generated program database files specified by the /Fd compiler flag. Use the COMPILE_PDB_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY property to specify the latter.
trans-unit.target: 链接器生成的程序数据库文件由 /pdb 链接器标志指定，并且与 /Fd 编译器标志指定的编译器生成的程序数据库文件不同。使用 COMPILE_PDB_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY 属性指定后者。

trans-unit.source: The linker-generated program database files are specified by the /pdb linker flag and are not the same as compiler-generated program database files specified by the /Fd compiler flag. Use the COMPILE_PDB_NAME_<CONFIG> property to specify the latter.
trans-unit.target: 链接器生成的程序数据库文件由 /pdb 链接器标志指定，并且与 /Fd 编译器标志指定的编译器生成的程序数据库文件不同。使用 COMPILE_PDB_NAME_<CONFIG> 属性指定后者。

trans-unit.source: The linker-generated program database files are specified by the /pdb linker flag and are not the same as compiler-generated program database files specified by the /Fd compiler flag. Use the COMPILE_PDB_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_<CONFIG> property to specify the latter.
trans-unit.target: 链接器生成的程序数据库文件由 /pdb 链接器标志指定，并且与 /Fd 编译器标志指定的编译器生成的程序数据库文件不同。使用 COMPILE_PDB_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_<CONFIG> 属性指定后者。

trans-unit.source: The list contains all commands for which help may be obtained by using the --help-command option followed by a command name. The help is printed to a named <f>ile if given.
trans-unit.target: 该列表包含所有可通过使用 --help-command 选项后跟命令名称获得帮助的命令。如果给出帮助，则将打印到名为<f> ile的文件。

trans-unit.source: The list contains all manuals for which help may be obtained by using the --help-manual option followed by a manual name. The help is printed to a named <f>ile if given.
trans-unit.target: 该列表包含所有手册，可以使用 --help-manual 选项后接手册名称来获取帮助。如果给出帮助，则将打印到名为<f> ile的文件。

trans-unit.source: The list contains all modules for which help may be obtained by using the --help-module option followed by a module name. The help is printed to a named <f>ile if given.
trans-unit.target: 该列表包含可以通过使用 --help-module 选项后跟模块名称来获得帮助的所有模块。如果给出帮助，则将打印到名为<f> ile的文件。

trans-unit.source: The list contains all policies for which help may be obtained by using the --help-policy option followed by a policy name. The help is printed to a named <f>ile if given.
trans-unit.target: 该列表包含可以通过使用 --help-policy 选项后跟策略名称来获得帮助的所有策略。如果给出帮助，则将打印到名为<f> ile的文件。

trans-unit.source: The list contains all properties for which help may be obtained by using the --help-property option followed by a property name. The help is printed to a named <f>ile if given.

trans-unit.source: The list contains all variables for which help may be obtained by using the --help-variable option followed by a variable name. The help is printed to a named <f>ile if given.

trans-unit.source: The list is reported in dashboard submissions.
trans-unit.target: 该名单在仪表盘提交中报告。

trans-unit.source: The list of dirs... given to DIRECTORY and an install destination given as a DESTINATION argument may use “generator expressions” with the syntax $<...>. See the cmake-generator-expressions(7) manual for available expressions.
trans-unit.target: 给 DIRECTORY 的 dirs... 清单和作为 DESTINATION 参数给出的安装目标可以使用语法 $<...> “生成器表达式” 。有关可用的表达式，请参见 cmake-generator-expressions(7) 手册。

trans-unit.source: The list of files... given to FILES or PROGRAMS may use “generator expressions” with the syntax $<...>. See the cmake-generator-expressions(7) manual for available expressions. However, if any item begins in a generator expression it must evaluate to a full path.
trans-unit.target: 赋予 FILES 或 PROGRAMS 的 files... 列表可以使用语法 $<...> “生成器表达式” 。有关可用的表达式，请参见 cmake-generator-expressions(7) 手册。但是，如果任何项以生成器表达式开头，则它必须求值为完整路径。

trans-unit.source: The list of features in this property are a subset of the features listed in the CMAKE_C_COMPILE_FEATURES, CMAKE_CUDA_COMPILE_FEATURES, and CMAKE_CXX_COMPILE_FEATURES variables.

trans-unit.source: The list of header files is used to generate a header file named cmake_pch.h|xx which is used to generate the precompiled header file (.pch, .gch, .pchi) artifact. The cmake_pch.h|xx header file will be force included (-include for GCC, /FI for MSVC) to all source files, so sources do not need to have #include "pch.h".
trans-unit.target: 头文件列表用于生成名为 cmake_pch.h|xx 的头文件，该头文件用于生成预编译的头文件（ .pch ， .gch ， .pchi ）工件。该 cmake_pch.h|xx 头文件将包含力（ -include 为GCC， /FI 的MSVC）所有的源文件，所以源不必须 #include "pch.h" 。

trans-unit.source: The list of resource IDs and number of slots from each ID allocated to each group for a given resource type. This variable consists of a series of pairs, each pair separated by a semicolon, and with the two items in the pair separated by a comma. The first item in each pair is id: followed by the ID of a resource of type <resource-type>, and the second item is slots: followed by the number of slots from that resource allocated to the given group. For example:
trans-unit.target: 资源ID的列表和分配给给定资源类型的每个组的每个ID中的插槽数。此变量由一系列对组成，每对之间用分号分隔，并且对中的两个项目用逗号分隔。每对中的第一项是 id: 后跟 <resource-type> 类型的资源的ID，第二项是 slots: 后是该资源中分配给给定组的插槽数。例如：

trans-unit.source: The list of resource types allocated to each group, with each item separated by a comma. <num> is a number from zero to CTEST_RESOURCE_GROUP_COUNT minus one. CTEST_RESOURCE_GROUP_<num> is defined for each <num> in this range. For example:
trans-unit.target: 分配给每个组的资源类型的列表，每个项目用逗号分隔。 <num> 是从零到 CTEST_RESOURCE_GROUP_COUNT 的数字减一。 CTEST_RESOURCE_GROUP_<num> 范围内的每个 <num> 定义CTEST_RESOURCE_GROUP_ <num>。例如：

trans-unit.source: The list subcommands APPEND, INSERT, FILTER, PREPEND, POP_BACK, POP_FRONT, REMOVE_AT, REMOVE_ITEM, REMOVE_DUPLICATES, REVERSE and SORT may create new values for the list within the current CMake variable scope. Similar to the set() command, the LIST command creates new variable values in the current scope, even if the list itself is actually defined in a parent scope. To propagate the results of these operations upwards, use set() with PARENT_SCOPE, set() with CACHE INTERNAL, or some other means of value propagation.
trans-unit.target: 列表子命令 APPEND ， INSERT ， FILTER ， PREPEND ， POP_BACK ， POP_FRONT ， REMOVE_AT ， REMOVE_ITEM ， REMOVE_DUPLICATES ， REVERSE 和 SORT 可以在当前CMake变量范围内为列表创建新值。类似于 set() 命令，LIST命令在当前作用域中创建新的变量值，即使列表本身实际上是在父作用域中定义的也是如此。要向上传播这些操作的结果， set() 与 PARENT_SCOPE 一起使用， set() 使用 CACHE INTERNAL 或其他一些价值传播方式。

trans-unit.source: The loadable module file (e.g. .dll or .so) of a module library target created by the add_library() command with the MODULE option.
trans-unit.target: 由 add_library() 命令使用 MODULE 选项创建的模块库目标的可加载模块文件（例如 .dll 或 .so ）。

trans-unit.source: The loaded environment will not survive past the end of the calling process. Do not use this module in project code (CMakeLists.txt files) to load a compiler environment; it will not be available during the build. Instead load the environment manually before running CMake or using the generated build system.
trans-unit.target: 加载的环境在调用过程结束后将无法生存。不要在项目代码（ CMakeLists.txt 文件）中使用此模块来加载编译器环境；在构建期间将不可用。而是在运行CMake或使用生成的构建系统之前手动加载环境。

trans-unit.source: The local option takes precedence over this variable.
trans-unit.target: 本地选项优先于这个变量。

trans-unit.source: The location of a library called <lib_name> for use with MPI.
trans-unit.target: 与MPI一起使用的名为 <lib_name> 的库的位置。

trans-unit.source: The location of the XCTest Framework.
trans-unit.target: XCTest框架的位置。

trans-unit.source: The location of the jar file so that you can include it.

trans-unit.source: The logging output during population can be quite verbose, making the configure stage quite noisy. This cache option (ON by default) hides all population output unless an error is encountered. If experiencing problems with hung downloads, temporarily switching this option off may help diagnose which content population is causing the issue.
trans-unit.target: 填充期间的日志记录输出可能非常冗长，从而使配置阶段非常嘈杂。除非遇到错误，否则此缓存选项（默认为 ON ）将隐藏所有填充输出。如果遇到挂起的下载问题，请暂时关闭此选项可能有助于诊断导致问题的内容数量。

trans-unit.source: The logical name of executable and library targets does not have to correspond to the physical file names built. Consider using the OUTPUT_NAME target property to create two targets with the same physical name while keeping logical names distinct. Custom targets must simply have globally unique names (unless one uses the global property ALLOW_DUPLICATE_CUSTOM_TARGETS with a Makefiles generator).
trans-unit.target: 可执行文件和库目标的逻辑名不必与构建的物理文件名相对应。考虑使用 OUTPUT_NAME 目标属性创建两个具有相同物理名称的目标，同时保持逻辑名称的不同。自定义目标必须仅具有全局唯一名称（除非有人将全局属性 ALLOW_DUPLICATE_CUSTOM_TARGETS 与Makefiles生成器一起使用）。

trans-unit.source: The low level module command to use. Currently supported implementations are the Lua based Lmod and TCL based EnvironmentModules.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的低级模块命令。目前支持的实现是基于Lua的Lmod和基于TCL的EnvironmentModules。

trans-unit.source: The macros provided by BundleUtilities are intended to be invoked at install time rather than at configure time, because they depend on the listed targets already existing at the time they are invoked. If they are invoked at configure time, the targets haven’t been built yet, and the commands will fail.
trans-unit.target: BundleUtilities 提供的宏旨在在安装时而不是在配置时调用，因为它们取决于调用时已经存在的列出目标。如果在配置时调用它们，则尚未构建目标，并且命令将失败。

trans-unit.source: The macros provided by this module were once intended for use by cross-compiling toolchain files when CMake was not able to automatically detect the compiler identification. Since the introduction of this module, CMake’s compiler identification capabilities have improved and can now be taught to recognize any compiler. Furthermore, the suite of information CMake detects from a compiler is now too extensive to be provided by toolchain files using these macros.
trans-unit.target: 当CMake无法自动检测编译器标识时，此模块提供的宏曾经打算供交叉编译工具链文件使用。自从引入此模块以来，CMake的编译器识别功能得到了改进，现在可以教其识别任何编译器。此外，CMake从编译器检测到的信息套件现在范围太广，无法由使用这些宏的工具链文件提供。

trans-unit.source: The main advantage to using this variable is to make a log level persist between CMake runs. Setting it as a cache variable will ensure that subsequent CMake runs will continue to use the chosen log level.
trans-unit.target: 使用这个变量的主要好处是使日志级别在CMake运行之间持续存在。将它设置为一个缓存变量将确保后续的 CMake 运行将继续使用所选的日志级别。

trans-unit.source: The module exposes the components C, CXX, MPICXX and Fortran. Each of these controls the various MPI languages to search for. The difference between CXX and MPICXX is that CXX refers to the MPI C API being usable from C++, whereas MPICXX refers to the MPI-2 C++ API that was removed again in MPI-3.
trans-unit.target: 该模块公开了组件 C ， CXX ， MPICXX 和 Fortran 。这些中的每一个都控制要搜索的各种MPI语言。 CXX 和 MPICXX 之间的区别在于， CXX 表示可从C ++使用的MPI C API，而 MPICXX 表示已在MPI-3中再次删除的MPI-2 C ++ API。

trans-unit.source: The module exposes the components C, CXX, and Fortran. Each of these controls the various languages to search OpenMP support for.
trans-unit.target: 该模块公开了组件 C ， CXX 和 Fortran 。这些控件中的每一个都控制着各种语言来搜索OpenMP支持。

trans-unit.source: The module provides a BISON_TARGET macro which generates BISON output. In CMake 3.13 and below the macro would generate a custom command that runs bison in the source directory. CMake 3.14 and later prefer to run it in the build directory and use CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR as the WORKING_DIRECTORY of its add_custom_command() invocation. This ensures that any implicitly generated file is written to the build tree rather than the source.
trans-unit.target: 该模块提供了一个 BISON_TARGET 宏，该宏生成BISON输出。在CMake 3.13及更低版本中，宏将生成一个自定义命令，该命令在源目录中运行 bison 。 CMake的3.14，后来喜欢在build目录下运行，并使用 CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR 作为 WORKING_DIRECTORY 其 add_custom_command() 调用。这样可以确保将任何隐式生成的文件都写入生成树而不是源文件。

trans-unit.source: The module provides a FLEX_TARGET macro which generates FLEX output. In CMake 3.16 and below the macro would generate a custom command that runs flex in the current source directory. CMake 3.17 and later prefer to run it in the build directory and use CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR as the WORKING_DIRECTORY of its add_custom_command() invocation. This ensures that any implicitly generated file is written relative to the build tree rather than the source tree, unless the generated file is provided as absolute path.
trans-unit.target: 该模块提供了一个 FLEX_TARGET 宏，该宏生成FLEX输出。在CMake 3.16及以下版本中，宏将生成一个自定义命令，该命令在当前源目录中运行 flex 。 CMake的3.17，后来喜欢在build目录下运行，并使用 CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR 作为 WORKING_DIRECTORY 其 add_custom_command() 调用。这样可以确保任何隐式生成的文件都是相对于生成树而不是源树写入的，除非将生成的文件作为绝对路径提供。

trans-unit.source: The module provides a GIT_SUBMODULES option which controls what submodules to initialize and update. Starting with CMake 3.16, explicitly setting GIT_SUBMODULES to an empty string means no submodules will be initialized or updated.
trans-unit.target: 该模块提供了一个 GIT_SUBMODULES 选项，该选项控制要初始化和更新的子模块。从CMake 3.16开始，将 GIT_SUBMODULES 显式设置为空字符串意味着不会初始化或更新任何子模块。

trans-unit.target: 要执行的模块子命令和参数,就像在你的shell环境中直接传递给模块命令一样。

trans-unit.source: The module will optionally accept the COMPONENTS argument. If no COMPONENTS are specified, then the find module will default to finding only the HDF5 C library. If one or more COMPONENTS are specified, the module will attempt to find the language bindings for the specified components. The only valid components are C, CXX, Fortran, HL, and Fortran_HL. If the COMPONENTS argument is not given, the module will attempt to find only the C bindings.
trans-unit.target: 该模块将可选地接受 COMPONENTS 参数。如果未指定 COMPONENTS ，则查找模块将默认为仅查找 HDF5 C库。如果指定了一个或多个 COMPONENTS ，则模块将尝试查找指定组件的语言绑定。唯一有效的组件是 C ， CXX ， Fortran ， HL 和 Fortran_HL 。如果未给出 COMPONENTS 参数，则模块将尝试仅查找C绑定。

trans-unit.source: The module will optionally accept the COMPONENTS argument. If no COMPONENTS are specified, then the find module will default to finding only the HDF5 C library. If one or more COMPONENTS are specified, the module will attempt to find the language bindings for the specified components. The valid components are C, CXX, Fortran, HL. HL refers to the “high-level” HDF5 functions for C and Fortran. If the COMPONENTS argument is not given, the module will attempt to find only the C bindings. For example, to use Fortran HDF5 and HDF5-HL functions, do: find_package(HDF5 COMPONENTS Fortran HL).
trans-unit.target: 该模块将可选地接受 COMPONENTS 参数。如果未指定 COMPONENTS ，则查找模块将默认为仅查找 HDF5 C库。如果指定了一个或多个 COMPONENTS ，则模块将尝试查找指定组件的语言绑定。有效组件为 C ， CXX ， Fortran ， HL 。 HL 指的是C和Fortran的“高级” HDF5功能。如果未给出 COMPONENTS 参数，则模块将尝试仅查找C绑定。例如，要使用Fortran HDF5和HDF5-HL功能，请执行以下操作： find_package(HDF5 COMPONENTS Fortran HL) 。

trans-unit.source: The modules listed here are part of the CMake distribution. Projects may provide further modules; their location(s) can be specified in the CMAKE_MODULE_PATH variable.
trans-unit.target: 此处列出的模块是CMake发行版的一部分。项目可能会提供其他模块；它们的位置可以在 CMAKE_MODULE_PATH 变量中指定。

trans-unit.source: The more modern approach is to behave as much like config file packages files as possible, by providing imported target. This has the advantage of propagating Transitive Usage Requirements to consumers.
trans-unit.target: 更现代的方法是通过提供导入的target，使其行为尽可能像配置文件包文件。这具有向消费者传播传递使用要求的优点。

trans-unit.source: The most basic project is an executable built from source code files. For simple projects, a three line CMakeLists.txt file is all that is required. This will be the starting point for our tutorial. Create a CMakeLists.txt file in the Step1 directory that looks like:
trans-unit.target: 最基本的项目是从源代码文件构建的可执行文件。对于简单的项目，只需三行 CMakeLists.txt 文件。这将是本教程的起点。在 Step1 目录中创建一个 CMakeLists.txt 文件，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: The most convenient way for a third-party to provide library binaries for use with CMake is to provide Config-file Packages. These packages are text files shipped with the library which instruct CMake how to use the library binaries and associated headers, helper tools and CMake macros provided by the library.
trans-unit.target: 第三方提供与CMake一起使用的库二进制文件的最方便方法是提供Config-file Packages。这些软件包是库随附的文本文件，指示CMake如何使用库二进制文件以及库提供的关联标头，帮助工具和CMake宏。

trans-unit.target: 最重要的特性是:

trans-unit.target: 顶层CMakeLists.txt中最近出现的 project() 命令将是 project(Second) ，因此将输出：

trans-unit.source: The name of the CPU CMake is building for.
trans-unit.target: CMake正在构建的CPU的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the CPU CMake is running on.
trans-unit.target: CMake运行的CPU的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the CPack binary configuration file. This file is the CPack configuration generated by the CPack module for binary installers. Defaults to CPackConfig.cmake.
trans-unit.target: CPack二进制配置文件的名称。此文件是CPack模块为二进制安装程序生成的CPack配置。默认为 CPackConfig.cmake 。

trans-unit.source: The name of the CPack source configuration file. This file is the CPack configuration generated by the CPack module for source installers. Defaults to CPackSourceConfig.cmake.
trans-unit.target: CPack源配置文件的名称。此文件是CPack模块为源安装程序生成的CPack配置。默认为 CPackSourceConfig.cmake 。

trans-unit.source: The name of the function that was called.
trans-unit.target: 被调用的函数名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the generator that is being used to generate the build files. (e.g. Unix Makefiles, Ninja, etc.)
trans-unit.target: 用于生成构建文件的生成器的名称。（例如 Unix Makefiles ， Ninja 等）

trans-unit.source: The name of the global autogen target can be changed by setting CMAKE_GLOBAL_AUTOGEN_TARGET_NAME.
trans-unit.target: 全球的名称 autogen 目标可以通过设置来改变 CMAKE_GLOBAL_AUTOGEN_TARGET_NAME 。

trans-unit.source: The name of the global autorcc target can be changed by setting CMAKE_GLOBAL_AUTORCC_TARGET_NAME.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置 CMAKE_GLOBAL_AUTORCC_TARGET_NAME 来更改全局 autorcc 目标的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the library that has dlopen and dlclose in it, usually -ldl on most UNIX machines.
trans-unit.target: 其中包含 dlopen 和 dlclose 的库的名称，在大多数UNIX计算机上通常为 -ldl 。

trans-unit.source: The name of the operating system for which CMake is to build. See the CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION variable for the OS version.
trans-unit.target: 要为其构建CMake的操作系统的名称。有关操作系统版本，请参见 CMAKE_SYSTEM_VERSION 变量。

trans-unit.source: The name of the package (or application). If not specified, it defaults to the project name.
trans-unit.target: 包(或应用程序)的名称。如果没有指定,默认为项目名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the package file to generate, not including the extension. For example, cmake-2.6.1-Linux-i686. The default value is:
trans-unit.target: 要生成的软件包文件的名称，不包括扩展名。例如， cmake-2.6.1-Linux-i686 。默认值为：

trans-unit.source: The name of the package vendor. (e.g., “Kitware”). The default is “Humanity”.
trans-unit.target: 软件包供应商的名称。（例如“ Kitware”）。默认值为“人类”。

trans-unit.source: The name of the package version file must match that of the package configuration file but has either -version or Version appended to the name before the .cmake extension. For example, the files:
trans-unit.target: 软件包版本文件的名称必须与软件包配置文件的名称匹配，但在 .cmake 扩展名之前，名称后应附加 -version 或 Version 。例如，文件：

trans-unit.source: The name of the source package. For example cmake-2.6.1.
trans-unit.target: 源程序包的名称。例如 cmake-2.6.1 。

trans-unit.source: The name of the top level project.
trans-unit.target: 顶层项目的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name to be displayed for a component.
trans-unit.target: 要显示的组件名称。

trans-unit.source: The named <target> must have been created by a command such as add_executable() or add_library() and must not be an ALIAS target.
trans-unit.target: 命名的 <target> 必须由诸如 add_executable() 或 add_library() 之类的命令创建，并且不能为ALIAS target。

trans-unit.source: The named <target> must have been created by a command such as add_executable() or add_library() and must not be an ALIAS target. If policy CMP0079 is not set to NEW then the target must have been created in the current directory. Repeated calls for the same <target> append items in the order called.
trans-unit.target: 命名的 <target> 必须由诸如 add_executable() 或 add_library() 之类的命令创建，并且不能为ALIAS target。如果策略 CMP0079 未设置为 NEW ,则目标必须已在当前目录中创建。重复调用相同的 <target> 会按调用顺序追加项目。

trans-unit.source: The named directory will be set as the current working directory of the child processes.
trans-unit.target: 命名目录将被设置为子进程的当前工作目录。

trans-unit.source: The named target must be created by add_library() within the project or as an IMPORTED library. If it is created within the project an ordering dependency will automatically be added in the build system to make sure the named library target is up-to-date before the <target> links.
trans-unit.target: 命名的目标必须由项目内的 add_library() 创建或作为IMPORTED库创建。如果是在项目内创建的，则将自动在构建系统中添加排序依赖项，以确保在 <target> 链接之前指定的库目标是最新的。

trans-unit.target: 下一步是添加必要的信息,以便其他CMake项目可以使用我们的项目,无论是从构建目录、本地安装还是打包时。

trans-unit.source: The next test makes use of the PASS_REGULAR_EXPRESSION test property to verify that the output of the test contains certain strings. In this case, verifying that the usage message is printed when an incorrect number of arguments are provided.
trans-unit.target: 下一个测试利用 PASS_REGULAR_EXPRESSION 测试属性来验证测试的输出是否包含某些字符串。在这种情况下，请验证在提供了错误数量的参数时是否打印了用法消息。

trans-unit.source: The number of lines to include as context which follow an error message by the ctest_test() command. The default is 10.
trans-unit.target: ctest_test() 命令在错误消息之后包含作为上下文的行数。预设值为10。
